reviewText: Nice, sexy Jean. I have a lot of Citizens and other high end denim. These fit snug, some stretch, but not a ton, slightly tighter in the thighs. Not as much "stretch" as my hudsons, jbrands, 7s or other citizens, but these are nice and sexy and hold their shape. I got a 25 (my normal size) they stretch a bit, but not a ton, so I wear them on my more "skinny" days! The color is perfect for casual or dressing up, crop length is perfect and modern. reviewText:
This review is for the gold-plated Mockingjay necklace.

Whereas the picture featured on the listing has a bit of an antiquey bronze look to it, the pendant is indeed plated in gold. This would be fine, except that the finish has a number of obvious imperfections: its a little scuffed in a few places, and there are quite a few bumps in the plating, as if the finish bubbled before it dried. The photo for the silver-plated pendant is actually a more accurate representation of the quality and aesthetics of the gold-plated pendant; just picture it in gold vs. silver, and there you go!

The chain, in contrast, looks a little more bronzed and aged, like the photo. It has a richer feel than the pendant, and I cant help but wish the Mockingjay had been finished in the same way. The clasp seems solid enough, though only time will tell!

The pendant is medium-sized, with a diameter of 1 , and the chain is a little more than 23 long (when laid out straight).

The necklace comes packaged in a plastic jewelry bag, which is placed inside a cute little gift bag: gray velvet with shiny gold trim and ribbon.

** Full disclosure: I received a free product in exchange for an honest review. **
summary: The gold-plated necklace looks different than that pictured.

reviewText: We own a tons of drool bibs since my son drools a LOT and these are far better than using a regular bib. For one, they are much cuter, but they also sit closer up to the chin so that there isn't a lot of space for drool to run down baby's shirt. They're thicker than regular bibs as well, and the snap in the back makes them more secure than the velcro versions. We own two packs of Adovely bibs and they've held up fairly well over the last 4-5 months. These are a little bit bigger than some of the other brands offered, which was noticeable when my son started wearing them at 3 months old, but since then he has grown into them. The photo does make the bibs appear a little bit brighter in color than they seemed in person, but I didn't mind that so much. However, the bibs with red are more orangey in color than I expected. We have both the whimsical and the nautical styles, and I will say that the ones with solid coloring have held up much better than the ones with the white backgrounds. After wearing them every day for months on end, they do tend to take on a yellowish tint where the drool collects, so just keep that in mind when picking out colors if you plan to be as hard on them as we have been. Overall, they've really helped cut down on the amount of times we have to change our son's shirts due to drool and we get a lot of comments on them when we're out and about.
summary: A tiny bit bigger than other brands

The colors on the socks are nice and vibrant and a good variety.  So far I am really happy with this purchase.  If you love fun or quirky socks, this is a great buy for you, or someone you love.

I did purchase these at a discounted rate for my honest opinion.  Having said that, I ordered another pair at full price for a gift and other socks from this company because I was so impressed with these.  I rely on these Amazon reviews as much as anyone else and I wouldn't want to give a good review to something I didn't feel was worth it to other customers.  I'd rather be honest and save others the expense.  In this case, these are a win.
summary: They are very nice and comfortable and don't have lots of loose strings ...

reviewText:
These are the cutest socks I've ever bought. Not only are they adorable, they are well made and comfortable to wear as well. I haven't washed them yet, but I tried some on and they fit me perfectly. I normally wear a size 6.5M or 7M in U.S. Women's shoes and sock size 9-10. I never could figure out how they came up with the different sock size from shoe size...
Anyways...so these socks are made in Korea, and they come in one-size-fits all for U.S. women's shoe size 6-9. They do seem to have some stretch to them and they fit me just right. They're snug, but not tight and restricted feeling, nor are they loose in any area. Basically, they fit snug from ankle to toe, but not so tight they leave impressions, or loose where they droop at the ankles or make my feet slip in slide inside my shoes. I so hate when I spend money on socks and they do that. I think these have just the perfect blend of fibers: 80% Cotton, 15% Polyester and 5% Spandex.
Then, there's the cuteness factor...these are honestly the cutest pairs of socks I have in my possession. I mean, they're so cute, I want to show them to everyone. It's a shame that they aren't visible while I'm wearing shoes, but there is one consolation. Our culture (Japanese) has us always taking our shoes off when we enter a home, so I plan on wearing these whenever I go to a house that has us taking our shoes off first. We used to do that at our house growing up, but stopped after we grew up. In fact, as a kid, I never wore shoes at home...we were always barefoot or in socks. It could be also that because we were so poor, my mom couldn't afford to buy us any. At any rate, these are super cute and comfy and I plan on keeping the Cat & the Panda ones for myself and maybe sharing the others with family members. They're just too cute to not want to share with everyone. Although I received these at a discounted, promotional rate (in exchange for my honest and unbiased review), I find that the price is very reasonable. Especially for the quality, besides being a novelty item. I like the different color stripes too...all on a neutral beige color background. I wish these came in kid's, toddler's and baby sizes, that would be so cute! But then again, there are already so many cute things for them, so it's kinda nice somebody thought about us big boys and girls.
summary: These are the cutest socks I've ever bought.

The strings have to tie way above my hips to just fit the crotch area without bunching (very high-rise) but overall the fit is cute. If you have any sewing skills, I would recommend maybe sewing a cup into the top to help keep their shape a bit better, and the crotch of the bottoms could be taken in a bit to make them more low rise. If you have a sewing machine this could be done easily. But otherwise I wouldn't recommend this bikini to anyone except fuller busted women with a very big booty.

For years I have thought about getting myself a septum ring, but life never seems to think its a good idea as something would always stop it from going forward.  I'm not someone who usually enjoys plain jewelry much, so I am constantly looking for things that are special or unique.  When I would look for septum rings over the years, I would run across usually simply plain ring designs in various metals which didn't really capture my attention.  I almost figured that I would have to actually have some custom made in order to satiate that want for things unique.  I also REALLY wanted to find something to try first before actually going through the process to make sure that it is in fact something I still have a true desire to do.  That being said, I was excited for the opportunity to try this nose ring at a reduced price for my sincere opinion.  On sight I fell in love with the design.  Not your boring plain septum ring (which is fine for some formal events of course), this one not only has jewels, but also rests a bit lower which I like also.  This ring feels very sturdy, and should last for quite some time.  It was very easy to put on, and remove, and did wonders at helping me decide that yes, a septum ring is still something I wouldn't mind having the ability to wear but in the meantime, I am more than happy with this lovely ring, and I plan to have a few others with just as good quality so that I can wear proper designs for proper occasions.  A fun and insightful buy.
summary: A Beautiful Quality Nose Ring That Gives The Look W/O Pain AND Can Help You Decide If You Truly Want To Get The Piercing

reviewText: This is so warm  it's my favorite  wish it came in more colors

For the positives - the color of the shirt is really nice and the fleece lining and flannel are super soft.  Unfortunately, I purchased a large based on the size chart and it is way too big.  I'm 5'7" and weigh about 134# with a 34 bust size - I wish I would have ordered a medium.

Despite the fact that size Medium fit me more like a size Large, don't let this deter you from buying this shirt! It is better than described! both the outside and the inside of this lined shirt are so super soft! The colors are even nicer than on the picture. It provides lots of warmth but feels very nice and light when you wear it. You can easily wear this shirt in place of a jacket, if it isn't raining. Maybe this is why it is slightly bigger than expected, so you can wear another shirt or sweater underneath it.

As you may know, it's very hard to find nice women's lined plaid shirts. I still haven't found a quilted one. This one has a fleece lining that is super soft!!! Most plaid shirts with any type of lining are made for men only, and who knows why. This shirt is not a men's shirt with the buttons reversed. It fits like a roomy women's shirt and what I like so much about it, besides the cozy soft flannel and fleece, is that it is not too short for me. I am 5'8"
and it fits nicely over my hips. It looks adorable on!!! The sleeves are slightly too long for me, and a size Small would probably have been just right, but I don't mind that. I prefer too long over too short. I may buy myself a size Small as well to wear without an undershirt and to see the difference.

Remember, too large is better than too small and consider this shirt to be an indoor/outdoor shirt. The extra room keeps you warmer and feels more comfortable, actually!
summary: Super soft inside and out, super warm, comfy and cozy! Beautiful colors! A tad larger than expected but that is a good thing!

**This review is for the Womens Shaping Band 3 in 1 Slimming Solution - Black Or Nude**

I got this in nude.  It did fit perfectly, I probably could or should have got it a size smaller to make it tighter.  I did wear this on my wedding day under my dress.  It really worked well and kept me tucked in nicely.

So compared to a name brand body shaper, this one does hold its own.  I wouldn't say top of the line, but if you were wanting to wearing this for everyday or even certain occasions but be able to breathe, then this would work perfect in my opinion.

I didn't have any issues with it rolling up or rolling down.  It stayed in place nicely with my wedding dress.  It is very breathable which is nice.  And it shaped me to give me that hour glass figure.

I really did like it, the only thing I would change is to make it a little bit tighter!

**I did receive this at a discount in exchange for my honest and unbiased opinion.  Compensation of any kind is never accepted in exchange for a positive review. All opinions expressed are my own and not edited by any companies mentioned.**

The makeup brush drying tower works well.  When I wash my brushes, I end up just leaving them on the counter to dry.  Tsk, tsk, I know.  It was easy to assemble, and easy to break down and store. The makeup brushes fit well.  I have big fat blush brushes and thin eye blending brushes.  They all felt like they were in there snug.  They didn't slide as they dried or anything.  I do love that I can break it down and store it.  My counter space is way too tiny to keep it out all the time.

The grip might be a little too snug as it wasn't effortless to remove the brushes.  I end up taking the top off and really pulling to get them out.  I'd rather do that than have the brushes fall out.  They should stay secure while drying, and they do.

It does feel a little cheap, but it might be because of the collapsible design.  It doesn't feel sturdy.  It does stay in place and in shape though.

I received this product at a discount or free for my review.
summary: Good makeup brush dryer for the girl on the go, or one who wants to save counter space.

reviewText:
This makeup brush holder and dryer has efficiently dried all of my brushes over a few hours in the sun. I used to use a bowl or cup and it didn't work as well because the tiny brushes were still wet by the next day and the wet brushes kept touching each other.

The makeup brush holder and dryer arrived in 3 pieces. There is protective filming on the materials that you need to remove showcasing the black sleek look. The product was extremely easy to set up. I have used a variety of different brands in the makeup holder from Japonesque to Eco-tools and they held up well in the elastic and soft rubber holes. The holes wrapped tightly around the brush handle deterring the brush from falling through. If you also don't have time to remove the excess water from your brushes than you can flip the flat part of the makeup holder around so the brushes are facing downward. Overall, in my preference, I wouldn't used the product as a makeup holder because the soft rubber holes do have a good grip so it isn't an easy reach and grab while doing makeup but, works great displaying your brushes and keeping them away from debris on the table. Therefore the holder is stable, none of my brushes touch while wet and it makes it easier to air dry. I received a sample of the Makeup Brush Holder and Dryer free of charge in exchange for my honest and unbiased review.
summary: A great way to have your brushes airdry

reviewText:
This dress met our expectations because I needed an age appropriate dress for my 13 year old daughter. She is a pageant contestant. The evening wear dress had to be an "approved" floor length dress. My first choice from Macy's was not approved. My second choice from JC Penny's was approved but I decided to look a little further on Amazon. I found my daughters dress! And I did not look any further. The pageant director & her assistant both agreed that this was the perfect dress for my 13 year old daughter. This dress helps to maintain a sense of innocence. Not too revealing, not too 5 year old'ish, not to 20-something, but elegant enough for a 13 year old girl.

Secondly, I needed it quickly. To be exact, I wanted the dress to arrive at my home atleast 10 days before the pageant. So, I changed my order to rush delivery $20 extra plus the $94 for the dress (I budgeted for $115 so I was good with that). I was reassured by customer service that I would receive my daughters dress on time. The dress arrived 3 days early! Another plus!
The pageant isn't until Sunday May 1st but she tried it on and she looks like Miss Universe! My husband & I are so pleased.
The dress is sturdy, stitched together very well. I purchased her a size 10 but she could definitely wear a size 8. The only alteration needed is under the arm. I think it runs small but my daughter has a small frame so that is why I probably should have ordered the size 8. If I had I would not have to get this small, minor alteration.
The dress is beautiful. The fabric is beautiful. The lace at the top was not just seen together w/out care. Someone took their time with this dress.
Sleeves are very long!

UPDATE: I did buy a second pair, and the back seam allowance on the second pair was so narrow, and the fabric is so (nicely) light weight, that the seam came apart and the fabric unraveled. I was very excited to receive this shirt in mail for a St. Patrick's Day party. I ordered it only three days before the party and contacted the seller. They were kind enough to send it out that next morning and the shirt arrived four hours before the party! I was very pleased with the level of customer service. The shirt arrived in a plastic bag packed in a mailing envelope.

The shirt design that shows on the front was exactly as expected. It was a racerback tank top with a great looking design on the front. It was printed clearly with know wear or tear and stretched with the fabric. I followed the size chart and the overall fit was exactly what I hoped in a size medium.

The only thing that surprised me and disappointed me a little was the tightness of the tank top. It is very form hugging and I was hoping it would hang a little more loose on me.. kind of like a workout racerback tank. The form hugging fit was a little uncomfortable, but that was because it was something I am not use to. The sizes are true to the size chart and the design looks awesome! Just beware that this shirt does not hang loose and hugs your curves. This should be mentioned in the description somewhere.

Thank you for the great service!
summary: Perfect shirt for St. Paddy's Day!

I purchased this mask in an attempt to prevent my 8 brothers from wearing my winter gear. Unfortunately, it sits awkwardly on my head.  I cannot quite pinpoint what is wrong with this facemask. I believe the opening for the eyes is too large so unless you have a large forehead, you will experience a weird gap. that allows the frigid winter air to creep inside.

I eventually gave up trying to reposition the mask and opted to wear the Voberry Women Ski Snow Snowboard Hat Winter Knit Thick Warm Neck Ear Face Warmer (Pink) in its place.

I purchased this full face fleece mask and neck warmer for extreme winter weather.  I chose to get mine in pink and i absolutely love it! The mask fits perfectly and is very soft and warm. I recieved this at a discounted rate for my honest review.

reviewText: This wallet is always clipped into my keychain, and that means my license is never separated from my carkeys, and there's one less thing to locate and grab on my way out the door. Beyond license, I stash emergency cash (practice folding in thirds) and a couple other cards. I like the motivation this gives me to keep things minimal, and I like the fact that I confirm at a glance that I haven't absentmindedly forgotten to replace the credit card. (Most membership and other info-presenting cards can just live on my phone now.) After a year it's holding up very well. Only the grippy silicone inside the elastic band has started to wear off; the elastic itself doesn't seem to be wearing out, and the three pockets continue to grip standard-size cards well enough that if I occasionally happen to leave the elastic unsecured, things stay nicely in their places.

Amazing! I got this after already being satisfied with my original elastic crabby wallet. This satisfied me just as much if not more! Theres an extra pocket on the back so now I keep my license in one pocket and my bank card in the other. The lesser user stuff I keep in the middle pocket. My keys are also attached, since I always kept losing them, now I haven't lost them for over a month! Great product.

Once again, a Rustic Town product surpasses expectation. This tote bag is high quality construction, with thick material, heavy stitching, and solid construction. The thick rope handles are comfortable and sturdy. Inner and outer pockets help keep things organized. This would make for an excellent beach bag. I can't wait to test it out soon!

I received this product at a reduced rate in exchange for my unbiased review.

I wasn't expecting this bag to be as large as it is. I was also not expecting it to be made as well as it is.

The colors are vibrant and cheerful. It looks like a beach type bag, but it can be used everyday if you'd like. It would be a super cute diaper bag too! The handles are thick and secured with knots to keep them from coming loose.  It even has a zipper to keep it closed. It has a large pocket on the inside for storage and it holds a lot of items. The material is thicker than I expected. Some burlap is made cheaply so it unravels easily, but I do not see this happening with this one. It looks like it could take a lot of wear and tear.

I received this bag in exchange for an honest and unbiased review. I am extremely happy with it!

I have received several products from Rustic Town and I couldn't be happier with their craftsmanship! This bag is no exception. I absolutely love the style. I am a huge fan of burlap, chevron, and anything pink so this bag has it all:) it is very well made and even has a zippered compartment inside which I use for my keys, lipgloss, wallet etc when I am at the beach. This bag easily fits 3 full sized beach towels. Honestly you will be impressed with anything that you order from this company!

As is sometimes the case, Chinese product sizing is a bit problematical.  I wear 33 or 34 waist and ordered these in tag XL.  Of the six pair, four fit quite well but two are undersized slightly in the leg opening resulting in a less than deisrable fit.  I may order again and get the XXL, however this is more a quality control issue that anything else I believe.  The ones that are proper fit give you an awesome lift and really make your package very prominent and are quite comfortable.  A good value even considering the fit issue.

So, a followup review here based on the results of my second order, in XL again. In both orders two of the six pair are seriously undersized.  Interestingly it was the red and yellow pair in both orders.  Not only are they undersized, while the fabric has the same texture as the other colors, it is not the same.  The fabric in the red and yellow has significantly less stretch and give than the other colors which makes the under-sizing issue even more of a problem.  But again the ones that are sized correctly are great.

reviewText: Originally, this was purchased for short, overnight backpacking trips but then i realized it wasn't going to be quite big enough even for short trips. I decided to keep it & turn it into my day hike pack and with a few minor customization tweaks, its turned out to be decent for its purpose. There is no opening for a bladder hose, if u planned to use this in conjunction with a hydration bladder..so i cut a slit & reinforced the sewing in that area & now it works perfectly. This backpack can fit enough of ur stuff, that the weight can get heavy on ur shoulders creating soreness on long hikes. To remedy that issue, i purchased a sternum strap separately, as it does not come with one..& that has seemed to alleviate that problem. If i had known i was to do these "alterations" initially, i might not have opted to purchase this pack..but over all its a nice quality daypack that will serve u well even if u have to make minor adjustments to suit u.
summary: but over all its a nice quality daypack that will serve u well even if ...

reviewText:
This is the nicest backpack that I've ordered on amazon.  We love to go hiking, 4 wheeling, camping--you name it--anything outdoors, and having a good backpack is mandatory!!  This one really is my favorite out of all the ones we have.  It's so nice, well made, with lots of room to store the stuff you need for any adventure.  I love the color, the style, the compartments--everything.  I couldn't be happier with this and can't wait to take it out on our next trip.  It's fabulous and I'd recommend it to EVERYONE!

Our granddaughter requested a peace sign necklace for her ninth birthday, and I was glad to find one that was a nice size for her, dainty and well made.  She loved it.

I purchased this as a gift for my sister on her birthday and she adored it.  The pendant is approximately 3/4" in length, and oh so sparkly.  It literally shines from all angles.  The center stone is of high quality with no visual imperfections.  The chain is 18" in length and of an open nature.  It can catch on long hair.  So care should be taken when putting the necklace on or taking it off.  However, the open link chain enhances the sparkly nature of the pendant by its flat polished links.  This is definitely an eye catcher, yet not so dramatic as to over power other accessories and clothing.  It functions more as an enhancement though when worn with an off shoulder dress it definitely draws emphasis to the skin with the cool tones of both the blue and silver.  The necklace came shipped in a nice burgandy gift box, making it perfect to use as a gift.

I received this item at a discount so that I could review it and share my findings with others. I adored it and so did my sister!

This necklace is so stunning! It looks very pretty in the pictures, but it is absolutely gorgeous in person. The necklaces comes in a very nice red velvet box that is embossed with Uhibros. The box is a great statement for this beautiful necklace and a great way to present it. If you give this as a gift, the box makes it even more special. I am attaching a picture of the closed box, where you can see the top. I am also attaching a picture of the Uhibros Sterling Silver Heart Pendant Necklace in the box.

The chain is an eighteen inch chain. Attached is a picture of it on my own neck, in case you want to see the length on a human. It is a twisted rope style. It is dainty, but durable and well made. The clasp is easy to use, and the chain is very sparkly. The pendant has a large turquoise stone that is extremely sparkly! It catches light very well, and glitters from across the room. The setting for the stone is a four prong, and the stone is well set. The turquoise stone is framed by two overlapping hearts. One is a simple silver outline of a heart. The second heart is made of a bunch of tiny cz stones or maybe Swarovoski clear stones. Whatever they are, they make what would be a pretty necklace - stunning! The necklace is the perfect size of a daily wear necklace. I attached the picture of the pendant in my hand to show the size better in my palm.  I have worn the necklace several days in a row and it is not tarnishing or discolored.

The Uhibros Sterking Silver Heart Pendant Necklace is a fantastic choice for a gift. I am going to buy my niece one of these for her 10th birthday. It is a a necklace she can be proud of, but it isn't so expensive that it would be too much responsibility. I did receive this product at a promotional price, in exchange for a fair and honest review. This review is not influenced by that at all. This necklace is extremely impressive, especially considering the very low price!
Nice pendant, my only wish is that it would have been a bigger size in diameter.  Still beautiful.

Every day I tell my kids I love them to the moon and back. I wasn't really fond of the necklaces that actually have that written on them though so when I saw this one I absolutely had to have it. It is sterling silver, the heart and moon are separate pieces so it moves, the charm is about the size of a dime, maybe a tad smaller. It's dainty and adorable. It gets pulled a lot because my twins, one in particular is obsessed with sparklies. She simply cannot resist reaching at my neck to grab it off. The chain is quite strong, I seriously thought it would be snapped in a day by one of them but it's been great. I told my kids the necklace meant I love you to the moon and back and they all fell in love with it. This is such a sweet little necklace. I'm considering buying 2 more for my twins.
I received this item at a promotional rate. My review is 100% my honest experience using this product.

I am always looking for an inexpensive gift to give one of my girls or my wife.  This silver heart and pendant moon necklace is as beautiful and well-made as anything that I can get at a local jewelry store, but at a much higher price from a store.

The product is exactly as shown on Amazon, and, if anything, a bit better in real life.  The pendant is sterling silver with a smooth gleaming surface with a heart hanging from the chain within the crescent moon.  Inset into the heart is a cubic zirconia that appears well-made and visually indistinguishable from a high quality natural diamond.  It comes in a lovely red velvet gift box.

The chain is of average quality with no visible flaws.  That said, the pendant is MUCH nicer than the chain, so you might want to consider upgrading the chain to something that does the pendant better justice.

Please note that I received this product at a discount in return for an honest review.  That said, the best review is from the receiver of the gift, my 18 year old daughter, who loves it.  Please vote if you find my review useful.

I received this product as a birthday present and I would like to say that it is a very adorable piece of jewelry that made a wonderful gift! It came in a little red box exactly like the pictures posted by the seller and by other reviewers.

The picture of this necklace compared to the picture is almost spot on. the heart looks the same but the moon - instead of a crescent shape, looks more like a backwards C. Overall I think this product still looks very nice and presentable.

If I was to have one complaint about this product it would be that the chain seems very fragile, I am worried that some day I will tug on it just a little too much and it will be broken. If they could fix this problem then I would give the necklace 5 stars.

I just want to point out that if you are not careful the pendant will come off of the chain very easily and it is somewhat difficult to put back together.

I was lucky enough to receive this product at a discount in exchange for my honest and unbiased review. I have to mention this disclaimer however, I am not affiliated with the company and I am in no way obliged to provide a positive review. The opinions expressed here are entirely my own.

reviewText: What a great shirt! I'm 5'5", 120 lbs., and I ordered an Asian medium (US 4). The shirt has a comfortable loose fit, yet still flatters my smaller frame. This is a great 'stay-put' suit for those who like to move around and actually swim.  Recommend.

reviewText: My son begged for light-up shoes for his birthday. So I searched the local mall and realized I could get them on Amazon for significantly cheaper. We received the shoes super fast (Oh how I LOVE my Prime!) He wore them for about a week before the issues began. At first, the left shoe would die much sooner than the right. Soon after, the left shoe would no longer charge at all. My son probably would've been happy wearing them even with only one working. But I knew it was only a matter of time before the other shoe would fail as well. They are novelty shoes, made of cheap vinyl. And scuffed VERY easily. But all that aside, I would've kept them if they would've worked longer than two weeks. The video is from the day my son received the shoes, when they still worked.

Well, the quality is not that of the picture. The leather is VERY cheap. The price is high for the bad quality of the leather. When the led lights are on, it becomes ok as the flashlight (strong) is what you'll be noticing and not the shoe anymore. These come with a charger.  The location of the plug for charging is inside the shoe, at the top.  My son loves it because of the lights. You can chose which color you want it on by pressing on a hidden switch inside the shoe. In my opinion, the location of the switch is bad since what happened is that even if you turn it off, while moving or running, my son's foot gets in contact with the switch and it turns on by itself. Since he cannot keep the lights off, he cannot wear them at school since shoes with lights (if they are on) are not allowed. I have seen other brands that placed the switch on the outer side of the shoe, and those are much better. I got the black as well for my younger son (4 and a half years), again, cheap leather. An extra problem with him was since he is younger, its hard for him to place his finger inside the shoe and turn the lights on, or chose colors or turn off the lights by himself. the only nice thing about these are the lights.
summary: The price is high for the bad quality of the leather

I don't often post reviews on Amazon -- usually only for things that were completely awful or things I absolutely love. This falls into the second category. My daughter wanted a hair tie bracelet for her birthday and there were several different ones on Amazon. The "brand name" one was really expensive so I ruled that out. So I ordered a Cari Cuff and several other cheaper ones as my daughter tends to lose things so I figured having a couple backups wouldn't hurt. I also ordered one from Kohls -- it was more expensive than this one so I figured if the Cari Cuff was ok, I'd just return the Kohl's one to the store.

The whole point of this is to say that this is not one of those "I got the product for free in exchange for my glowing review"-type reviews. I purchased this bracelet along with several of its competitors using my own money. And I will say that the Cari Cuff was by far the nicest of all of them. It arrived in a beautiful gift box while the cheaper ones were in cheap plastic bags with barcode stickers on them or in a flimsy velvet drawstring bag with threads hanging out of the seams. The Cari Cuff is sturdy and a nice weight while the cheaper ones were flimsy and easily bent. The hair tie stays on it well while it falls off the cheaper ones all the time. The ends are nicely finished on the Cari Cuff while on the cheaper ones, it is like they were just cut from a long band of metal and not sanded or shaped in any way so they are a bit sharp -- they can scratch both your wrist and your laptop or desk if you lean your wrists against them to type. Comparing the Cari Cuff to the more expensive Kohls bracelet, the Cari Cuff was still the winner - the Kohls one was overly heavy and clunky and had a weird pattern design....and it was HUGE (as in probably would have fit my husband huge). No way would it stay on my daughter's wrist so I ended up returning it.

So overall the Cari Cuff is heads and tails above all the others I ordered. And perhaps the best testament to that is the fact that it has not left my daughter's wrist since day 2 (after she spent day 1 trying all the different bracelets) -- anything she manages to not lose or misplace is something she really really loves. (And note: after over a month of constant wearing, the bracelet still looks brand new so the finish is holding up great.)

And a maybe even better testament is that while I figured I would just wear the cheaper ones that my daughter rejected, after trying to use them all for the last month and being annoyed that the hair ties keep falling off and my wrist and laptop keep getting scratched by the unfinished ends, I am back here ordering another Cari Cuff for myself. (Happy Mothers Day to Me!)

So if you are trying to decide which of the many hair-tie bracelets here on Amazon is the best value, I would definitely recommend this one. It is a little more expensive than some of the other ones on Amazon, but well worth the extra money!
summary: Really nice! Heads and tails better than other hair tie bracelets...

So here's the thing... I absolutely LOVE how vibrant and colourful these pants are. They are flowing; they feel amazing; beautiful pattern!!! BUT... the material is flimsy. It is cheaply made cloth. This is the second of these palazzo pants I have bought. Yes, even after receiving the first which was very thin fabric that tore after two weeks.... I loved the colour, pattern and design so much that I bought this one. It hasn't torn yet, but I know it will be any day. I recommend this if you have a SPECIFIC function and intend to wear this ONCE and want to like really nice and flowing. If this is a pant you plan to wear more that a two or three times, FORGET IT. The elastic band will stretch around the waist and it will loose the snug fitness, little cotton balls will form on the inside by the thigh area if it rubs even slightly, and of course, eventually, it will tear.
summary: Great for a one time wear!

Ordering clothes online is always a daunting prospect as you cant inspect the item before getting it. You cant see the size, the material, or the overall quality. I will admit I was a little skeptical about this outfit as its extremely well-priced and it almost seemed too good to be true. Ive seen similar outfits for three times as much as this one. Well, I can say with all honesty that this was well worth it. First, its just as adorable in person as it is in the product pictures. Both the shirt and the pants are super soft and you can tell its quality material, not super cheap, stiff, or itchy material. Its a really nice cotton and the design is so darn cute! I absolutely love the little tie and you can actually move the little piece on the tie to adjust the tie. If you are concerned about the little piece coming off, you can just take it off too. The suspenders seem to be screen printed on, and it is done very well. I didn't notice any imperfections with the screen printing and I thought the detail on the back of the shirt was a wonderful touch. As far as sizing, I got the XS which says 1 year and I would say this is equivalent to 12 months so the sizing seems to be pretty correct. Overall, this is an adorable outfit and I would order from them again! I received this product at a discounted rate in exchange for my honest, unbiased review.

reviewText: This dress is beautiful!!!! Just what my daughter wanted for prom. It is well made and came on time. I sent the seller my daughter's measurements when I placed the order to make sure it came out perfect. I fell it's a little long, but nothing some nice high heels won't fix.

This dress is AMAZING. At first, I was a little skeptical about buying a prom dress online, but I was on a short budget and didn't really have much of a choice. Upon seeing the good reviews that HTYS has, I decided to order this dress from them. I asked the customer service, Jane, LOTS of questions; and she patiently and quickly answered all of them. I gave my exact measurements, and I also asked them to customize the color AND add a shoulder drape for me. And they did  it at no extra cost! The only problem was that I ordered it less than two weeks from our prom and had to choose expedited shipping, so I had to pay a little more. Still, the dress WITH the shipping cost way less than how much others spent buying a dress from an actual dress shop. PLUS, I didn't need to get it altered because when it arrived, it fit perfectly right out of the bag! :D (If you're thinking about how long the dress looks on me, that's probably my fault because I might've been off about my height measurements by a little.)

The dress itself is GORGEOUS. The beadings are full, and they even gave extra beads just in case some fell off (but none did despite how much I moved around that day). The color, for me, is exactly like the picture, and it is so pretty. The back of the dress has a small trail, also. And the shoulder drape that I requested just made it even more elegant and perfect for me. In addition, it is very comfortable to wear that I didn't even want to take it off after the event, lol!

I received lots of compliments from friends and family during and after prom. And with the overall price that I paid, with customizations and all, it certainly looks and feels like it's worth WAY more than $90! I am so lucky that I found this seller, and I DEFINITELY recommend them to anyone! I'd certainly buy from them again. :)
summary: I'm in love with this dress!

I am not affiliated with the manufacturer nor the seller of this product, I am not compensated, I am under no obligation to leave a positive review.

I purchased these maternity pants because I had to face facts that I no longer fit in my regular jeans anymore. What a emotional day at my house. However, these pants were super comfortable. I am a little thick and petite. The pants were a little long on me but I am use to it by now. They always are and finding petite jeans that fit just right is a hassle. I will say my calves are huge. Like pin up girl cartoon calves, lol. The stretch on these jeans are fabulous and I always have issues looking for jeans that fit in my calves. I basically wear boyfriend jeans as skinny jeans. The hidden elastic band is great. It does not roll down and fits over my belly. I will say I am a fan of the side panel for maternity jeans so if these jeans happen to go that route I will give it 10 stars! The quality of the material is very soft seams durable and they are the same exact color of the one pictured. Usually the color is a little different but these are true to the pics. The stitching is great no loose strings, no frays, the fabric looks of great quality. The jeans are very soft and made of 98% cotton with 2% spandex. I have washed them and they do not shrink and the color was just as bright as when I received them. All together I am very pleased with the purchase of these maternity jeans and the quality of them. You can basically use them to just run errands or go out on a nice night with friends and family. They are very nice.

I received these maternity jeans free or discounted in exchange for my honest and unbiased review.
summary: Great color, love the quality, and the fit is good.

reviewText: Great for the money!
I do like this suit, had to order it a little larger to fit hips and waist, bra cups are a little too large for me, but I'm going to make it work.

This is such a cute, and sexy, but modest suit. I'm 5 feet, and 167 pounds. And ordered XX Large, based on other reviews. I think a size smaller would have fitted better, as i'm so petite, so this felt a little long in the torso. Also, my boobs are kinds of swishing around, and there's a cup gap, so definitely, i think i'll move down a size. Or two as i'm constantly on a diet. I still looked very divine in it, nevertheless. I have no pictures for you, as I'm not comfortable with my jiggly legs.

I recently wore it in Vegas, and as the weather was a little inclement, and i disliked the pool facilities in our hotel, i wore this under my jeans, as a bodysuit. This Sales Assistant literally leaped out of a store at me, telling me how much she loved it. And it is very shapely, gives you a great bust, as the cups are quite firmly shaped. I did in fact, stuff some wadded up TP in there, as my ladies were looking a little sad, so i gave them a boost. My waist is slimmish, so i had a good curvy girl thing going on.

But on the whole it's a well made suit, it's made of decent material, not thin, or transparent. it comes in a clear zippered bag, so if you get it wet, you can keep it away from your dry clothes whilst you travel.

I am 5'11, about 165 lbs. and a small B bust cup.  I feel like all reviewers should say their height, weight/build and bust size when they say the suit is too small or too large.  There are so many raters saying too small or too large.  Confusing.  I rated that the product "fits as expected" because it is truly an XXL and I feel that it would fit a female who normally wears an XXL and they have a quite a large bust (maybe a big C or D?).  I don't wear an US XXL.  Normally, I wear a LARGE (or a US 10, 11 or 12)  in most clothes and most swimming suits.  I ordered XXL based on all of the reviews about the size of this suit running small and the size chart said to try XXL if you wear a US 10-12.  That is not accurate.  I feel that it was too big for me, because I don't wear an XXL.  The torso fit well.  I have about 35 inch waist.  About 43 inches for my hips.  It was slightly roomy but not at all baggy all around.  Fit my behind very well.  Great boy short length. The main problem for me is that the very sturdy formed padded cups for the bust are just way too big for me because I am a small B bust cup.  I used to always wear 2 pieces and I would get a L bottom, but a M top and that worked fine.  I wasn't sure how molded or rigid the padded cups would be so I thought I'd be okay with this, or that I could put gel inserts in, but no.  It's for a very large busted lady and those padded cups would probably be appreciated by a big chest.  I LOVE the style.  I just wish the cups were more forgiving.  I wish I could somehow take out the sturdy cup and have the material just sit on my chest without the rigid padding.
Not for ladies with large chests!  I'm a 34G, I ordered the XL and the tiny little cups look absurd on me!  I am deeply disappointed and would gladly give it 0 stars.
summary: I am deeply disappointed and would gladly give it 0 stars

It is made of the same material as the little princess dresses that are "silk" that you would buy your 4 year old daughter to play dress up in. So, all in all, if you're only interested in buying this swimsuit for the looks, go for it. It's flattering. But if you actually want to swim or get it wet, this is not the suit for you. Good luck shopping!

reviewText: Super cute

I was very excited to find this jumpsuit on Amazon since I have been looking for this exact jumpsuit for years! I had one back in the 70s and loved it! The jumpsuit was supposed to arrive anywhere from the middle of March to the end of March, but I received it very quickly, however that is where the good news ends. This jumpsuit is not at all like the picture! It is not denim, but a very thin cheap stretch material. The string is in no way long enough to criss cross twice in the back and still tie at the waist! The waist and zipper were also not as pictured, the picture shows a waistband with a button and a heavy duty zipper, these have no button and the cheapest zipper I have ever seen and defective as well, it was very difficult to zip up or back down.  Since it was coming from China, I ordered a size twelve (12) when I am usually a size six (6), it fit, but it was snug. After reading the other reviews, I can't believe we are all reviewing the same garment! I am 5'2" so I expected to need to hem, but one reviewer stated at 5'9" they hit her at her knee? Even if I was 6'2" these would have been long enough to wear with a 4" heal! I wonder how much it will cost to return this to China?

I have been searching for a while to find long, stretchy overalls and I am so happy I purchased these! The material is thin and came with a few snags, but nothing that wasn't mendable.

I am 5 9" and a US size 14. These are perfect in length! They hit the floor with enough room to wear with a little wedge shoe.

Now let's talk about the fit as these run small. I ordered an 18 and they are still a little too snug, I will need to wear a body shaper under these.  That being said; my boyfriend said they look great on the backside which is a plus as sometimes the rear on the curvy gals gets a little smashed with certain garments but these have great stretch!

Ok lastly, the string set up is a little confusing to get into, especially when your wearing it. I ended up laying the garment on my bed and pulling up the photo to figure out how to tie it. It comes with one long string (over 7 feet) that you pull at the top to make pleates and then weave down your back. I decided that I  liked the lift it gives you by tieing the top part as a halter so I cut the string in two. The smaller piece for the top and the longer piece for the back. Plus this makes it WAY easier to put on and I think it gives a more flattering fit.

Hope this helps. :-)

For how inexpensive these were, I was worried that they would rip easily or not fit correctly, but they have absolutely exceeded my expectations for any swimming suit. Also, my 8 year old sister had open heart surgery about 4 months ago and has a large scar in the middle of her chest and this covers almost the whole scar so she doesn't feel self conscious wearing the swimming suit around others which thrills me more than words can describe. When my sisters outgrow these, I will definitely be buying them again in bigger sizes!

Very very cute dress. The fit was very accurate to the sizing chart provided. Some things to note--
First, the cups that are sewn in are ridiculously small and  kind of in an odd place. I took mine out with two quick cuts and it looks soooooooo much better. The fabric is firm enough and thick enough that you do not need those weird little cups.
Second, the bow in the front has two different lengths hanging. I don't know why but again it was an easy fix. I just cut mine and did a few stitches to make them the same size. Easy.
Third, the seam around the waist wasn't fully done on  my dress. Which was weird. It just had two spots where it looked like they forgot to sew the seams together. It was also a super easy fix if you know how to do some very basic sewing (or use youtube).
Fourth, the lace up back allows you to adjust the dress perfectly to your curves. I love this so much and it really sold me on the dress. You definitely need help getting laced up properly but the effect is stunning.
So overall I loved the dress BUT it was not perfect straight from the bag. If the idea of doing a little sewing scares you this is not the dress for you. If you can handle it I more than recommend. Once I finished my dress it looked way way more expensive than it was. The fabric is really nice and the fit is beautiful. It is so worth the price. I got so many compliments and people asking where I got it. Also, it HAS POCKETS!!
summary: Beautiful dress but needs a little help

This is  great looking bag made with high quality materials and great attention to detail. This bag is exactly what I was looking for:
- looks professional enough to be able to take to work, but looks good enough that I would want to use the bag anyway for everything
- stylish but utilitarian design
- large enough to carry a small computer (13 inch ish)
- designed for use electronics (ie, well padded) but without the overplayed techy flair

The ideal size of a bag is such a subjective thing, but this bag hits the sweet spot for me. I think its obvious, but it should be noted that this bag is much larger than 'Tablet Briefcase' would imply, but smaller than a lot bags designed for use with computers. The size is perfect for me to keep everything I need for my on-the-go productivity/gaming setup.

This bag is well padded, so I know my electronics are stored safely. It looks like it is made of rugged materials and I'm excited to see how well this bag ages.

I think Filson hit the bulls-eye with their Tablet Briefcase. This is the perfect small briefcase.
summary: Exactly what I was looking for! Quality briefcase perfect for use with a small laptop

Very nice pants. The description says Classic Fit, but I'd say it's closer to US Slim Fit. I'm guessing it's Classic Fit in China. My size 30 and 31 pants are slightly different in color and material. They still look good, so I don't really mind. My waist is 76, so while the size 30 did fit, I wanted more room so size 31 was perfect. The waist is about 80 cm, the thigh about 60 cm, and the hem about 36 cm. My size 30 pants felt more tighter than the other size 30 pants I ordered from Funumeng (funumeng Men's Classic Fit Flat Front Pant Light Grey). I'd say CN size 31 is about the same size as US size 30. Check my pictures for comparisons to an American brand of pants. I guess the only bad thing is the slight inconvenience of maintenance. The care label and official website say that these pants need to be hang dried. The care label says I can machine wash, although the official website says I can't. I guess I can experiment on my size 30 pants so my size 31 pants can avoid any possible damage.
summary: CN Classic Fit seems to be US Slim Fit. You should probably order 1 size up.

reviewText: Great
Really cute!

The  Zebra Print Bodycon Midi dress is definitely a pick for a girls night out or a date with that special someone. The dress totally hugs the curves so if you are not comfortable with that this may not be the dress for you. I'm not totally pleased with my body at the moment but I just had a baby two months ago so I can get myself some slack. This fine dress gives me a weight loss and shaping up goal to work toward.

This dress is very affordable, so much so that I imagined the material would be see-thru and that the seams would be shotty. However that's not the case as the material is a reasonable thickness and doesn't show things like your panties or bras through it. The seaming is holding up well and there's been no loose strings. I love the stretchiness of the material and the fact that it's likely a dress I won't be having to iron (I hate ironing). I'm 5 foot two inches tall and 127lbs currently. A size small fits well and it hits me just below the knee. It is asian sizing so chose accordingly and pick a size up if needed.

Overall, this is a nice basic dress, that has lots of perks, and it's easy to care for. I can change it up by pairing it with jacket, leggings, and other accessories! Totally recommend it!

My first Review is on the XXL. I normally wear a 3XL, which fits comfortably. I can occasionally wear 2XL on shirts that are cut large. A regular 2XL will be somewhat snug. I had meant to order an XL and an L to try each (at this price, what the heck). By error I ordered a 2XL and an XL.

Immediately upon opening I realized that they felt different from other compression / slimming undershirts. I rechecked the product page and realized that I had also missed the product material description. 100% nylon. Well, nylon simply is NOT going to provide the compression force necessary to accomplish anything useful. Then I put the shirt on and noted that it was simply like a tighter cut regular 2XL. I did not note ANY compression effects. Also, it was just as warm (hot even) as any other compression / slimming undershirt that i have had - and is not to any extent "breathable". In fact, this will now become an undershirt for when I workout to help stimulate warmth and sweating.

(I think that - for those who remember the old Banlon Shirts - it accomplished about as much as wearing a tight-cut 2XL Banlo would have!)

When I try out the XL version, I will update this Review. I really don't expect much improvement other than it should obviously be tighter.

The main problem isn't so much with the sizing as with the product material. Other shirts of this type are usually part nylon and part other material (usually spandex), such as 90% nylon and 10% spandex or 85% nylon and 15% spandex. Something along those lines.

That will likely affect my Star Rating (downwards) if that is the case. I only gave it a 3-Star at this point because of the fact that getting the 2XL was MY fault.

UPDATE 4/18/22017:

After trying the XL, I have to downgrade to a ONE-STAR rating.

This does no compression at all. I am not that "fat", having previously competed in regional powelifting and boxed locally.before that as a super heavyweight. Competitively up to 18-20 years ago when I was 6'0" / 250. Over the last 15 years or so, have gradually gone up to abut 275, mostly around upper torso (a bout with Pseudo Cushings starting 12 years ago boosted that up to over 315 for a couple of years until brought under control, thanks to a visit to NIH in MD, and have been easing weight back down). But when going out to something more than local errands, I prefer to wear an undergarment compression t-shirt to do just that..... compress.  And also help provide tension to provide back and abs support.

This product does NOT do that!

All compression shirts seem to lose that compression over a period of time (just as do compression socks - worn due to a DVT a few years ago - even when worn only about 50% of the time). This brand isn't even as good as compression shirts over a year old!

(BTW... a hint for longevity to compression socks or shirts is to have sevderal pair, rotate them frequently, and truly handwash and air dry!)
summary: Sizing Could Be Better - But MAIN Problem is Material

Giving this a 1-star review because of Woolrich's customer service.
- They require you to use their shipping label and original box, rather than using Amazon's item return process.
- They do not support exchanges, only refunds.
- They charge an "item restocking fee" on returns.

Woolrich, if you're reading this, your shirts are great, but I highly suggest you improve your customer service through Amazon for returns/exchanges.

reviewText:
I have noticed people making comments that they don't believe the reviews of products that have been made by people who have received the product at a discount. I order many products from Amazon and I try to provide a review for each product I receive, whether it is discounted, free, or I have paid full price.
I would absolutely never give good feedback on a product I did not like simply because I rely on other peoples reviews when purchasing something from Amazon. That being said, this product is just what I needed.  It is sturdy and perfect fit in my drawers. As a matter of fact I will be purchasing a few more sets for my kids. I did receive this product at a discount in exchange for an honest review.

This review is for a Closet Underwear Organizer by ValuableService. This is a box set of 4 organizers for different uses and items.

We chose these to aid in organizing our many socks and personal items within our closets and drawers. These come with a zipper for collapsible storage (as you will see in the photos). These fit in drawers nicely and can be placed on shelves in the closet etc. We suggest more of using them in drawers than as a slide in and out on shelves. The sides are sturdy for what they are and the interior boxing is very flexible to allow for thicker to thinner socks, ties and delicates. The seams are sturdier than they appear, however if you were to cram anything inside them, the material may rip if too much is forced inside.

We bought these thinking they were a heavier build, however, they are on the flimsier side.

These are not the best quality drawer organizers, however they are decent for what they are. More of a box store brand than a high end brand.
We would recommend them for college students who need to organize for extra space and for the smaller items such as underwear, socks, nylons and even for bathroom storage of make up supplies and so forth. But not for the kids who cram items inside. More for the organized kids who take care of their belongings.  Not a bad little set to have, but if you are seeking organizers that are more boxy, with little flexibility, these may or may not work for you.

As product testers, we received a discounted price on this product to give our honest and unbiased review of said product. Our reviews come from hands on testing and are not influenced by the seller. Nor are we affiliated with the seller or Amazon in any way. Pictures have been included for your convenience. Have Questions? Feel free to ask and we will do our best to assist you.

Was our review helpful? If so, please select YES below.
summary: Decent Quality Organizing Boxes - Flexible - Recommend for Delicates

reviewText:
I just received these today and they are perfect! My dresser, which came with our bed, has very small drawers and large openings at the top that are large enough to fit another drawer but have nothing in them. These closet underwear organizers are the perfect size to allow me to make use of the area! ValuableService advertises these as  organizes for the selves you hang in your closet, seeing as they work wonderfully for me to make use of unused space in my dresser I feel they will work well when used for their intended purpose as well.

Pros:
Easy to put together, great size, easy to organize your delicates or a variety of other items.

Cons:
The bottom is just cloth so it is not very sturdy. It is designed to go inside the hanging closet shelves which are, most likely, supposed to be the support for the organizer.

Verdict:
5 stars for being great organizers that have allowed me to use all of the space in my dresser!
summary: Great organizer that allow total utilization of space.

reviewText: I love these socks! I wear flats everyday for work and hate not wearing socks. I've spent quite a bit of money on similar socks from Payless and Walmart and they always show or are like $5 for one pair.... that's just too much for not being happy with them. I took a chance on these socks and am very happy I did. They fit great, stay on mfit heel, and don't show. Each pair has a unique pattern which makes pairing them after laundry easy; some aren't that cute but they don't show so who cares. It'd be a good idea to wash them before wearing... I didn't and my feet were temporarily dyed black. You should wash them alone at first and then with darks from then on to be on a he safe side.

These are a great value. I wear shoe size 7.5-8 and these are pretty snug, so they may not work for someone with bigger feet. I got mostly animal print designs--I'm not a huge fan of animal print, but I don't mind it in small doses. Besides, you don't see them much anyway. They are small enough to not be visible under any of my ballet flats, and they are very thin so they don't interfere with the fit of the shoe. The decorated portion is made of a mesh-like material. A few have snags in them after a couple of uses, but they are still wearable. For the price, I wasn't expecting incredible durability.

Each came in its own labeled bag, so these could be used as stocking stuffers or cute party favors, too.

Wearing socks with shoes are a must and what is more important is socks for my heels.  I tried and like these HZB Girls Ultra Low Cut Pattern No show sock liners.  They are cut as designed, low cut and not too much of the material shoes when I wore these with my heels.  Even if there was some showing, I do not mind because I like the print on the material.  Each pair of these low cut socks had different designs if no there was a duplicate pair which I like because there is variety and it does not look like I am wearing the same pair of the socks every day.  I wear size 7 and these fit well, the elastic did not budge into my skin as other socks I have tried do.  Disclosure: I purchased this item at a discounted price in exchange for my honest unbiased review.  I am not under any obligation to give a 5 star review, if not warranted. If I feel the product is not a 5 star, I would rate it accordingly. If my review has helped you in any way to make a decision please feel free to let me know by clicking on the YES button below.

I got these socks to be worn with some very, very low tennis shoes. They absolutely work size-wise. They fit perfectly and don't show at all. The designs are cute--actually much cuter than I expected. I'm not usually one for animal prints, so I was relieved to see that not all of them were animal print and those that were actually weren't as tacky as those designs often look. Unfortunately, there are a couple of other issues with them that prevented me from being able to give them 5 stars. They seemed reasonably well-made, but one sock ripped towards the toe upon first wear. It may have gotten snagged a little on the inside of my shoe or something, but it really ripped quite a bit. I haven't had the same issue with any other pairs yet, but feel the need to be honest about the fact that it happened with one pair. They also tend to slide off my feet. I wear a size 7 1/2-8 in shoes normally and they feel like they are fitting as intended, but I have had major issues keeping them on my feet when walking around all day. Aside from that, though, they are very comfortable. They are a thin, soft material. I've had no issues with them shrinking when washed, and the colors have also stayed vibrant. I'm not sure if it's just my feet, but these things fall down into my shoes all day long! I really wanted to love them, but they just don't do the job easily. I received this item at a discounted rate in exchange for my honest review.
summary: I wear a size 7 1/2-8 in shoes normally and they feel like they are fitting as intended

You can tell it's made for the Asian market so if your child is petite then this might be great for you.  Slim arm holes, shorter length and slender a-line.  Boden has great sales, so if you time their sales then you can buy their product for a very comparable price.  I always buy end of season for next year.

reviewText:
This Anca Demi Double Layer Strapless Dress is really cute and is breathable! I'm normally a 3X-4X so I went ahead and went with the 5X and it fits me just fine without being too tight. The only reason I'm giving this dress a 4 star instead of 5 star is because it is rather see through mostly through the white sections; the black is a tad bit see through depending on the lighting but the chest area does have an extra layer on it so your chest isn't see through. This dress is a good length on me as I'm 5'8 and it goes to just about my ankle; I like that I can wear flats or heels with this dress without having to worry about the bottom getting damaged. The material of this dress is 95% cotton and 5% polyester so it's pretty lightweight; it doesn't weigh you down or made you overly hot during warmer weather. I would recommend this Anca Demi Double Layer Strapless Dress but I would recommend going up a size or two since this dress is not in U.S sizing!

**I received a discount on this product for testing and reviewing purposes and this is my honest and unbiased opinion**
summary: Anca Demi Double Layer Strapless Dress Is A Good Length, Very Cute, And Lightweight! Is A Bit See Through Though!

reviewText:
These shoelaces are really fun! They work so well and the kids love them.

I got 3 pairs of these for each of my 3 kids. They are 7, 12, and 14 and I was pretty sure my 7 year old would like them, but not so sure about my older ones. They have been a big hit for all of them.

My daughter put them in a pair of converse and she loves that she never has to work about dealing with long laces that come untied and all of her friends are now asking to try on her shoes.

They were really easy to install and have been very durable so far. She has worn them for a few weeks without any issues whatsoever. These are really cool and are a great idea! reviewText: a little off with size otherwise it is great
Nice heavyweight bag for reasonable price
Bag is TINY TINY TINY - completely opposite from the title "Oversized".

I absolutely love this bag.  I was pleasantly surprised how roomy it is and how much stuff I can fit in it.  It's just the right size for an overnight bag, however, I have been using it as a diaper bag.  It's not huge or heavy, has lots of pockets to keep baby stuff, toddler stuff and my stuff, and the best part is my husband doesn't mind carrying it because it doesn't look girly or like a purse!  WIN!

There are two end zip pockets that are very nice in size, a zip pocket on the backside of the bag, two nice sized pockets on the front  that velcro shut and a partition inside to keep things orderly.  Inside there is a small zipper pocket on one wall, a middle zippered compartment that creates a partition and two open pockets on the other wall. This bag has the option to carry it by two  handles on top or by a removable, adjustable chocolate brown shoulder strap, which complements the mocha color of the bag.  The shoulder strap easily hooks to loops on each side and adjusts to your preference, including rotating so the straps never get twisted.  My bag has a few threads that I need to snip off but otherwise is well made, sturdy and stitched well.

reviewText:
We ordered a size 2 for my daughter who weighs 94 lbs and is 145 cm or 4'9 ft tall. (Chest 30; Waist 25; Hips 28) This dress fits her perfectly. It's well made with no loose seams and the stitching is straight. Some of the sequins could have been sewn tighter as they ended up twisted backwards because the thread was too loose. It was easy enough to correct but will be something to watching moving forward as the sequins thread might continue to loosen. I will update my review if this occurs. The zipper is easy to use with no issues of it coming off track or coming down on its own. The material cut, style, and quality are accurately portrayed in the product listing. We received exactly what we expected, not a cheap knockoff.

Absolutely beautiful! I love it! I wanted everything blue for my simple wedding and this is perfect. Received about 3 and a half weeks after placing the order. Still 4 weeks earlier than anticipated.

I got this dress for my daughter's winter formal. It arrived on time and was beyond lovely. She literally got stopped twice in the parking lot at dinner and was complimented on the dress and was better then anything we saw in the store and 1/3 of the price. Although her measurements suggested she needed a size 6, I felt that would be too big so I got her the 4. She is 5'9 and 130 pounds with a very long athletic frame...not a lot of curves (she's 15). This is why I went 1 size down. The dress fit her perfectly everywhere but was a shade tight right under the arms. Someone with less of a lean frame then her should probably order more true to the size chart. The only other thing I'd say is the dress is meant to be long and drag the floor a bit. The dress would be a nightmare to hem so I'd bear that in mind and make sure that the length won't bother you. You will need to steam the dress after it arrives as the chiffon will wrinkle. For $100.00, you really couldn't do any better.

They have this same dress in about 12 other colors but the orange one was the only one available in Prime which meant we could get it in 2 days versus 3-4 weeks for all the others.

Bottom line if you like this style - this is the company to buy from.  My daughter loved this dress but wanted it in Dark Navy Blue which they didn't offer in Prime so we had to purchase this same style from another company because they were the only ones who could have it delivered by the date we needed, which still took about 2-3 weeks using rush delivery.  The dress we got was beautiful, but we paid more and it wasn't even close to the quality of these dresses.  For example in the back there is a zipper near the bottom and then the lace corset on the back which really helps hold things together on the other dress there was no zipper at the bottom it just had the lace go all the way down which made it so it didn't fit as well.  Also the top bodice didn't have near the amount of beading that this one does.  Trust me if you like this style this is the one to buy.  Just make sure your order early, like a month in advance.

I got this outfit for our God daughter and at the time she was wearing a 5T. By the time I was able to give it to her she'd had a growth spurt jumping up to a size 6X, so I was concerned it wouldn't fit her. Thankfully, it's a perfect fit!

This outfit is made in China. It arrived with no chemical smell and no loose seams. The top is so thin she'll wear it with a white cami underneath, not only because it's a bit see through but also because she'd be too cold without one.

The belt and shorts are material I'd wear, haha. Very cute and a bit professional looking. This will make an adorable outfit for church. Good value for currently under $12.

Uploading some photos so you can get a closer look and see the wash instructions. (This is without a cami, untucked, and in a rush so the bow is tied sloppily but still a very cute outfit.) Most importantly, she loves it. Smile. Recommended. Hope this is helpful!

reviewText:
This little girl's outfit is absolutely adorable in every way!  I wish this came in my size ;)

I ordered the size 5/6 for my very tall and thin three year old.  She is 44" tall and 40 lbs. The beautiful heather-grey shorts are bunched appearance, with an elastic waist and a matching belt.  This style is great for my thin daughter, where length is typically an issue if I want the bottoms to fit her waist.  These shorts look like a skirt when on, but with an active toddler, give the privacy that shorts offer.  These come mid thigh on her.

The shirt is a very elegant sheer light cream color.  It comes nice and long and the back is a couple inches longer than the front.  Due to the light-weight material, even though my daughter is thin, this shirt falls against her and does not look too wide (like many of her shirts).  The arm holes are a little wide, but since the material is sheer, she will already be wearing an undershirt with this, so that is not an issue for us.  The collar is made of the same material as the shorts, so it all ties in beautifully together.  The back of the shirt has a hidden delicate zipper, with a sweet little pearl button closure at the top.  Very cute addition when my daughter has her hair in a high bun.

This outfit is extremely well made - not a thread out of place!  The style is versatile enough that my daughter will get at least a couple years out of it!  Very pleased with this purchase.  I plan on having my daughter wear this for Easter, with a button down sweater.  I can already predict all of the compliments she will be receiving from relatives - it is a very cute and elegant outfit!

I was fortunate to have received this product at a discounted price.  All of the experiences and opinions expressed are that of my own.  I hope that this has helped in your decision making.  Happy shopping!
summary: Absolutely stunning and classy outfit for my toddler!

reviewText: This is such an adorable little girls outfit. I can't wait to give it to my granddaughter. This is a two piece shorts outfit. I love the stylish and classic design. It would be cute for any age. I love the sleeveless and high contrast collar shirt and the tie at the waist wide leg short. The shorts will be wearable for years to come. They are a good length and have an elastic waist. The top is made from a cream light weight. georgette fabric. The collar and shorts are made of a poly cotton blend. Shorts are machine wash in cold water. The top should be hand washed in woolite. I love the some of the special touches on the shirt. There is an invisible zipper on the back of the shirt for easy changes and a pearlescent button closure behind the collar. The collar sits high on the neck and has sharp points on the end. It looks so good. I would totally wear this if it were in my size. This outfit is perfect for just about any occasion. It would make a great outfit for a photo session, birthday party, dinner out, or just anytime. I received this item at a promotional price for testing purposes. reviewText: I was REALLY disappointed in this swimsuit...there is no way I can wear it. I ordered a medium, which is usually a safe bet for me (even though sometimes I need a small bathing suit top). The cups are incredibly small, and since they are sewn together in the middle, I can't even adjust them on the string like you can on a normal string bikini. So what results is unattractive side boob and I look larger (fatter) than I am because of the terrible fit. The bottoms are also incredibly small and unflattering. The only reason I  gave it 2 stars and not 1 is because I do really like the design of the bathing suit...you would just have to have like 0-5% body fat for this bathing suit to work for you. reviewText:
I wanted to love this swimsuit but I absolutely hated it. Even though I ordered it sometime at the beginning of march, it took until middle of april to arrive. I guess be prepared for international shipping. After reading reviews, and seeing that the swimsuit was too small, I decided to order up a size and get a medium. For reference, I am about 5 ft 3 in and 110 pounds. I usually wear a small in swimsuits, but the band was way too loose on the top. The cups were probably slightly smaller than a regularly sized small. They aren't adjustable so even if I were to tighten the band it didn't work. I didn't even bother to try on the bottom, but it looked like the material was a little thin. I will say that the top appears to be made of quality material though. The colors were cute and seemed to go well together. I also really liked the design of the swimsuit, but I would probably spend a little more money and buy a more quality swimsuit. The company seemed to be good with returns though.

Note: I received this product at a discounted rate in exchange for my honest review. That said, all opinions are 100% my own and not influenced in any way, shape, or form by the discount!

This put me in an awkward place because it felt like I was between sizes, and there's not an option to mix and match. I decided to go smaller rather than bigger (rookie mistake), and while the top fits perfectly, the bottom is cutting into my hips (not cute).  I can ameliorate this with other bottoms, but I wish I could've worn the set! Overall, great material, great color, great option if you have a normally proportioned body :) ps-- Looks and feels exactly like a triangl suit! I have one from years ago and literally cannot tell a difference in quality.

Note: I received this product at a discounted rate in exchange for my honest review. That said, all opinions are 100% my own and not influenced in any way, shape, or form by the discount!

When I had it on with my leggings and my little black sweater assemble I got several several compliments about how well and how cute the outfit it was.

 When I first took it out of the package I didn't think it was going to be as cute or pretty until once you got it on. Once I put it on and accessorize it with everything it made an absolutely beautiful outfit. So I can say that without a doubt this dress did exceed my expectations and the fact that I could wear it two different ways and it look nice both ways and it fit me perfect.

When I wear this dress I had no problem with it trying to creep up in the back over my butt or sliding down over my breasts. The dress stayed up where it was supposed to and stayed down where  it was supposed to...

 I am going to be posting pictures when this review goes live so that you can see how nice it looks on.

reviewText:
I was very disappointed by the size. It says in the listing: Fits reference:5'5/120 lb/Bust 35''. I am 5'0/109 lb/Bust 34" so I expected it to be a little big, but the dress was super tight and short. It also says there's an elastic closure but there is no closure at all, so I don't know what that's supposed to refer to. I wouldn't say it was uncomfortable tight, but every little thing shows. You can tell what type of underwear I'm wearing.

I did find it to be stretchy and the dress seemed to be well constructed though a simple design. The top band was not tapered or contoured in as something that's going to lay above the boob area should be, so it slides down as you move. The top band also doesn't have any additional elastic to help keep it in place. Since I had purchased this to wear to work it could still be appropriate for nights I work behind the counter at the nightclub, but I don't think I can wear it as I would be pulling it up all night to keep my chest covered. Would be great for someone super skinny, shorter then 5'0" and kind of small chested. I got the red dress and am absolutely in love with the color!
