reviewText: I love this bag!! It has several compartments to store things. It's true to the color as well. The leather is so sooooo soft and supple. You know how some bags have faux zippers? Not this one every zipper is an actual pocket on the bag. There are 3 zippers on the outside (two on the front and one on the back) and 2 on the inside. I'm really surprised at how deep the bag is. I was able to fit an entire notebook inside, along with my wallet, mini makeup bag, keys, sunglasses, etc. with room to spare! The one and only thing that I didn't like was the smell. It's awful! I can't even describe it but it's bad. I had to let it air out for a day or so and now it no longer has that smell. If you can get past the first day or so, you'll really enjoy this bag. While I did receive this item at a promotional rate in exchange for an honest review, this experience is that of my own and hasn't been influenced by any outside sources. I really do love this bag lol. It has multiple hooks in the back so that you can change how you wear it. Very versatile and it would make a really nice gift.

I received this item at an extremely discounted rate in exchange for an honest and unbiased review.  All opinions are my own.  I want to say that I was a little hesitant about this bag.  I've never had anything that was genuine leather and I'm not real familiar with the care.  I decided to get it anyways because I needed something to carry my netbook, my Nintendo 2DS, and my movies to and from work on the overnights.  I received this bag this morning in the mail and while I was super excited to try it out, I was a little disappointed when I realized the only thing in the bag was just the backpack, not care instructions.  I figured I could find care instructions on the internet, even though that's a little bit of an inconvenience, totally worth it for such an awesome backpack.  This really is a cool little pack.  I was honestly surprised by the amount of stuff it can hold.  I have in it right now a netbook, 4 DVD cases, a Nintendo 2DS, the netbook charger, the 2DS charger, and I still have a BUNCH of room that I could put stuff in there.  This backpack has 3 external zippered pockets, 2 internal zippered pockets, 2 small internal pouches, and 2 large internal compartments.  I was seriously shocked by the amount of "hidey" space in this bag.  I want to mention that the magnetic clasp seems very sturdy, like it will hold up to a good amount of abuse (which is great considering I intend to use it everyday!)  I like that you can adjust the shoulder straps to suit your need.  I feel like these straps could be used on a child, as well as an adult.  I'm a large person and they adust out big enough that I'm very comfortable wearing this product around.  Now that I've got the pros of this bag out of the way I'd like to point out a few things I'm not particularly happy with.  First, I don't like the color.  While it is true to the images on Amazon, it's just not a very attractive color in my opinion.  I feel like a darker brown would have been more attractive.  This bag does come in blue and black also, so that's a plus.  Second, this is genuine leather.  It does have a leather odor.  It's not a pleasant smell, in my opinion.  Some people like it, I believe, but not me.  Other than that I really do like this bag.  I definitely like it a lot more than I originially thought I was going to.  All in all I can definitely say I'm really impressed with the space inside this bag and would recommend it to anyone, really.  Don't think it's especially a "child's" bag but could definitely be used as one if you've got a kid that likes leather.  Nifty little backpack.

Talk about CUTE! I have come to love these Vintage Retro Bikinis. They are perfect for women like me who are "curvy" ... let's just say they generally accentuate our "assets" nicely. I have about 2 or 3 of this style already and I'm really happy to add this one to my collection.

I am 5'8", 180lbs, with a 34b/c chest and 44" hips.... so lets just way that it's difficult to find a swimsuit that has structured cups that fits both the girls and the junk in the trunk. I got the size XXXL 12/14 ... I'd say they are closer to a 12 than a 14 to be honest especially if you have broader hips. Unfortunately while the bottoms on this fit me well the top is much too big and the girls are pretty much "swimming" in the cups. I really wish that there was an option to purchase these things separately .... or that we could have a couple mixed size options for those whose proportions are not "standard". The bottoms fit me very well and really helped to accent the curves nicely. The garments are both are nicely stitched, well structured and very comfortable.

I still love this design so I may have to either add some cutlets or find some way to get the top to work for me.... because I really want to wear this to a party that I'm going to in a few weeks. All I need is some big framed sunglasses and a wide-brimmed had and some bright red lipstick and I'll have the whole Retro look going on!

reviewText: Love the shirt.

This ROMWE Round Neck Half-Sleeve Casual T-shirt dress will definitely be worn a lot by me.  I really like it. Due to its simple and neutral style, its one of those shirts you can pair with various other clothing items to create new outfit styles and many fresh looks.

The shirt has a modest round neckline and half-length sleeves that are styled to look like they are rolled up. The folded cuffs only serve to give the T-shirt dress a nicer casual and more effortless look. The color I ordered is a neutral light taupe beige color and due to the neutral color, it looks nice either by itself or pairs well with other clothing.

The sizing seems to run slightly small, so I recommend you order a size larger if you like a looser fit like I do. The material of this piece is 95% cotton and 5% spandex, giving this shirt dress a smooth light feel to it while still having some stretch. The material is a bit thin but is in no way sheer or see-through. It is super comfortable and smooth and a great piece to wear during warmer climates.

What I like about this piece of clothing is its versatility. You can wear it as a light casual T-shirt dress in the summer, pair it with a coat or cardigan in the fall and winter, and even turn it into a tunic but pairing it with some skinny jeans or tights whenever you want.  With some different jewelry pieces, accessories, or even a belt, you can turn this dress/tunic into many different outfits, all for a very reasonable and inexpensive price.

I received a sample of the taupe dress for testing and use and I will definitely be going back and purchasing some of the other colors. This is a great find!
summary: Wonderful Versatile Casual T-shirt Dress or Tunic! Great Price and Find for Many Different Outfits!

reviewText: I think this is mislabeled and is really a large shirt.

I ordered this Tshirt Dress in grey. However, the color is taupe. Its made with 95% cotton and 5% spandex. The material is very lightweight but not see though. Its extremely comfortable like an oversized tshirt. I ordered the largest size that was available at the time which is a Large. It does fit snug in the stomach area so an XLarge would have fit much better. My bust is about 40 around and I wear a 38D. The top portion fits ok but I like my tops fairly loose.

This top does have a good amount of stretch to it. I really like the tshirt neckline so its not low-cut. The sleeves are long and loose fitting. They hit right at my elbows and they have a 1 fold over cuff. The cuff is only attached in the under seam. So you may have to press down the sleeves for them to stay folded.

Measurements of Large

Chest: 19.75 wide

Waist: 17.5 wide

Sleeves: 10 long

Length: 32 long

Theres a straight hem with double stitching. This length might make a good dress for those that are petite. However, for tall people like myself, its best to wear as a tunic. This is a fairly basic top so it can be worn in many ways. You can leave it long and wear with leggings. You can even scrunch it up around the waist and pair it with jeans. Another great way is to dress it up with a cardigan. Its a great versatile top. Being lightweight, you can wear it year around because a cardigan can be worn over it for cooler month. I received this product for free in exchange for my honest and unbiased review.
summary: Great Dress for Petites  Great Tunic for Taller Women  Color is Taupe, not Grey

reviewText:
Tungsten is a very, very heavy metal. I know because my wedding ring is pure tungsten, and I've worked with tungsten metal before.
This ring? It's so light, you'll think it's aluminum.

The inlay it brittle, the ring itself is way too small, too thin, and there are markings on it where is was poured into a mold.

It's cheaply made, and I doubt very seriously the legitimacy of the type of metal used.

This is a really, really nice ring with a very modern design.  I wasn't sure what to expect, as it's hard to buy jewelry online, but I am thoroughly impressed with this ring, both in design and quality.  I've been looking for a nice color-themed (red/black) ring to wear as part of my DJ persona when I perform on stage and when I was offered a discount for this ring in exchange for my honest evaluation and opinion, I couldn't say no!  It has a very nice shine to it both on the outer gunmetal colored band as well as the inlay around the center.  The Carbon Fiber inlay is vibrant with the a shiny red color interwoven as well as two bright and thin metal strands that go the full circumference.  There isn't a rough edge to be found on this ring, and it is very comfortable to wear with very smooth surfaces and a nice rounded inner area. There are no engravings, imprints, or markings of any kind anywhere on or inside the ring band, just as an fyi.  It is not a very bulky ring either, which I like, and it has a very low profile on your finger.  Every time the light hits it I see a new area of the design that I like in the inlay, and the resin covering the inlay is crystal clear.  Overall, I'm happy with this ring, it's style, it's quality, and certainly it's price for all of the above! I can easily recommend this to anyone looking for this style of rings.  It really looks like something I could've easily dropped four to five times the price on in a jewelry store, and I certainly won't be letting my friends know how much of a bargain it really was!
summary: Very nice ring, great modern design, and very comfortable to wear.

NOT UV PROTECTIVE! These are really thin gloves. I could use my phone with them on, which I thought was great, but they didn't protect my hands. The "decorative" buttons fell off after a few days. This is a really nice assortment of beautiful stone plugs, especially at such a great price. The reviewers who ar complaining about some of the stones not looking exactly identical to the photos need to take into account that these are NATURAL stone and therefore the patterns can vary. Individual sets of stone plugs can sometimes cost as much as this entire assortment, so its completely reasonable for one or two of the pairs to not look exactly like youd want them to. Im very happy with the quality, I like the way most of them look, and the sizing is perfect (I am a 00g). Cant complain. Well worth it.

reviewText: So I am new to running and have three kids youngest being only 2. I'm not as small as I use to be and I have hips that I am trying to lose. They do not fit over my hips but the do fit every where else, so I will be saving them for when my hips get smaller.

I love leggings and workout wear, and the patterns in this line of leggings were pretty fun to pick from!  I chose the Green & Black, which is a black fabric with "splashes" of bright green on it, as though it were splashed with paint.

The fabric is thick, not like some other pair which were too thin and almost sheer once you put it on.  You can't see through the fabric.

I am 5'7" and about 125 lbs, and these are almost tight on my legs.  The waist is on the lower side - not super low though (see my photo).  The waist has a nice wide band but it is a little loose at the waist and in the back it feels too low (while the front feels fine).  These are the kind of pants that may not cover your underwear in the back when you sit down.  I can still certainly wear them but the fit is not perfect.

These leggings are a lot of fun and I get a lot of comments when I wear them!  The pattern is fun and these are comfy to wear whether you are working out or even working around the house.

reviewText:
These are super cute little socks. They are, of course, too  small for my feet, but they actually fit my tiny mother, who ought to wear children's clothes. But she really liked these socks. They are soft, plush and fit well.

These socks come in a nice box, almost like a gift box. Really cute. I would have gotten these for my kids when I used to do my one 'underwear' gift every Christmas when they were little. They would have thought they were fancy socks!

The colors on the ribbing are nice, giving the socks a sporty look and feel. The colors seem to hold fast in the wash, so far, even holding up to a bleach wash and not losing any color. The elasticity seems to be holding up well too.

All in all, a really nice set of socks in a nice presentation gift box.

I am happy to provide this honest and unbiased review of a complementary or deeply-reduced-priced product so that I can help inform other consumers the way I am informed by consumer reviews when I am purchasing items.

I wear a size 9, and my 10 year old granddaughter wears a size six, so we were able to test how the socks fit for both ends of the size range, and they passed with flying colors. These socks are soft, fit from size 5 to 9 as advertised, and they're stretchy enough to retain their original shape after being worn, so we could even share them if we wanted to.

The socks are thin enough to allow some air flow, but they are not overly thin. They're just the right thickness to look good with loafers or athletic shoes, and they're moisture wicking and have some odor control capability, so they're going to be perfect for those days my granddaughter has Gym class.

What I appreciate most about these socks, besides how cute they look, is that the seam work is neatly done both inside and out.  It bugs me to no end when socks have a bundle of loose threads on the inside that snag my toenails, so it makes me happy that these socks are neatly finished with no obnoxious ridges on the toe or heel seams, and no loose threads. These socks are reasonably priced, comfortable, fit well, and look good after being washed, so I think they're a very good value.
summary: Quality construction, soft and good fitting

reviewText:
There is only one other review up for these socks and she said it perfectly. I LOVE them. I also have slightly smaller feet and these fit perfectly. Not only fit but feel lovely. The construction of the sock is exceptional. Not much in the way of making a bulge on your foot. They go up high enough, in fact for me they are just right ho2ww they fit about 3 inches above my ankle. I would never have thought of the fact that most are "stapled" with a plastic piece by a "gun" and often pull a tear into the matrial trying to get them out. The first reviewer mentioned how they are wrapped in a paper band. SO MUCH BETTER!!! I have only one complaint:  I want them in solid colors!!!! I would buy a bunch of them. Well.. heck, I will buy more none the less as they fit so well and feel so good on.
I was given these free for an honest review and this is right from the heart. They are great!
summary: Comfort and fit in one package.

Anyway, I love this pencil case. It's adorable, it holds about twenty pens, pencils, lead refills, and highlighters. Plus it compliments my Vera Bradley backpack. It's been dropped and thrown by me a few times--you know, just standard product testing--and there hasn't been a thread out of place. I've gone through a number of pencil cases during my education and tenure as an amateur artist. I don't know if I'll ever look back after this.

reviewText: I love this soft light sweat shirt, and so does my little one!

I rely on detailed reviews when I purchase items off the internet.  This product did have one anywhere!  Not even on the companys website! So I purchased 2 sizes (after learning that I can return the product for free) to determine the fit.  I am 56, weight 132 pounds, have a 33 waist (thats all the better I can do after having 4 kids), and have 37 hips.  The sizing charts on all the pants/shirts products both on Amazon and the companys website have very skinny waists.  I bought a medium and a large.  Both fit.  The large, however, made my hips look too big.  The way the skirt hangs makes the hips flair/stick out on the sides too much.  So I stuck with the medium.  I could probably get away with a small, but nothing is worse than having something too tight.  So, when determining size with leggings/skirts, I personally would go with the hip measurements, not the waist measurement.  The 28/29 waist fit around my 33 waist no problem and it is not overly snug.

This skirt if very comfortable and the leggings can be adjusted to how long you want them.  If you want it to look like you are just wearing a nice skirt, you can pull the leggings up to your knees . . . and it is still comfortable.

Since these are leggings, not loose shorts, there is no attached brief inside.  You can wear your own underwear, wear nothing, or purchase an official swim brief (for fast drying purposes).

A couple things about the skirt that I did not know:
There are ties on the inside side of the skirt and the outside side of the leggings. These ties can be tied together when swimming to keep the skirt from floating up.  When the ties are untied, the ties are short enough that they are not hanging down past the bottom of the skirt.

Cons:
While the elastic in the waistband is nice and wide, it seems to twist every time I put the skirt on.  Every time I put it on I have to manipulate the elastic so that it lays flat in the casing.  This is no big deal because I am going to put 2 or 3 small cross-stitches in the waist band to keep the elastic from twisting every time I take it off or put it on.  Once it is on, the elastic doesnt twist.  And you cant really tell too much from the outside when it is twisted because the elastic is loose inside the waist band, so the waist band still lies flat.
Also, it might just be how I am built, but there are a few wrinkles/puckers in the skirt between my waist and the top of my butt.  The skirt is well built, in that it doesnt look like that should happen, and it lies nice and flat everywhere else.  Maybe my but sticks out too much? Or maybe the material wasn't pulled up high enough in the waist band when they sewed it together? Anyway, I don't think this is a big deal because I am wearing a swim shirt or tankini top that will cover it up (even when I raise my hands all the way up).
summary: have a 33 waist (thats all the better I can do after having 4 kids)

reviewText: I was SO excited to get this jacket, the picture is gorgeous! The jacket is pictured with all silver color hardware. The jacket I received would be PERFECT with all silver color hardware. I love the jacket but need one that has silver hardware like what was pictured. I NEVER would have wasted my time and tied up my $$$ on a black leather jacket with brown zippers, even if they were all the same color. The worst part is that they couldn't even settle on a single color hardware, but put THREE DIFFERENT COLORS on the same item. It looks plain awful. I included several pictures of the actual item I received to help anybody decide if they would want to order such a thing, at any price...I wouldn't pay $10 for this with all the different color hardware on it. The leather jacket itself is wonderful, but the mismatched hardware ruin the look of the jacket entirely.
summary: BUYER BEWARE - item you get is NOT what is pictured! 3 different colors of hardware on the jacket...NONE silver as pictured.

reviewText:
This is absolutely adorable! I love that it looks a lot like the picture!

PRos:

1) this dress looks almost exactly like the picture. I love that the picture that is shown is the dress that comes to your doorstep. It is nice to know what you are ordering, and in this case you can rest assured that you are getting what expect.

2) this fabric is silky. I expected a cotton dress, and I am not sure why, but the fabric is really quite comfortable and wonderful. I really like how it  looks and the fabric seems to have taken the print nicely with no running in the dye at all. This is an awesome fabric for the dress and is lightweight and will be cute and comfortable for summer wear.

3) the dress is fully lined. I really like this option as it is a white base, so it is nice that the dress isn't see through! Additionally this is nice as it hides the seams and makes it so the child isn't bothered by them all day long. We all hate when clothes are itchy and lumpy. YUCK! This one isntt, and that is nice!

Cons:

1) this dress is a bit wide. This is probably not a huge deal to most, but my daughter is a bit of a twig, so it does hang a bit oddly around the chest and waist. This is ultimately ok as she wears this one for everyday use and finds it comfortable. It would likely fit a little girl who is a bit more solid as well. All in all it is not a huge issue for us and we still love the dress!

Note: I received this item at a discount in exchange for an unbiased review.

Ladies, this is for you. ZANZEA has designed and made an incredibly affordable and stylish dress. I have ordered this style in two colors. And three colors in a different style. All are a Boho style. The fit is perfect, the colors are gorgeous, the style is amazing. I'm a standard 10 or 12. I'm 5'7". These dresses will take me to a casual day or a nice night out. The material is soft and flows over the figure correctly. This style offers so many possibilities. Add scarfs, bold jewelry, drapery type vest, or long sweaters. Wear this Boho style with every type of shoe, from sandles, heels, to boots. There is no end to the creative possibilities.
Now about the price. Really amazing price. The look is far more expensive. I'm so impressed with this product, I simply can't wait for the next season's designs. Ladies, you simply can't go wrong.

I picked 12 bc of the bust size on the chart. Mine is over the size 10, but wearing the 12, I'm sure the 10 would fit me fine with still enough room that it would let feel confining. The 12 isn't so big that I would want to exchange it, I think it's perfect, I prefer roomier and flowy clothing, I just think if I picked a 10, I would still be ok bust size comfortability wise. I just received this and I already want to purchase another one! I wish there were more colours available. Yes, they are 2 toned.(the yellow does resemble the colors on the model) The yellow is: (top) hard to describe the hue, but it's def not yellow yellow or canary yellow. (Bottom) more like spicy brown/grey poupon mustard. I like "mustard" yellow hues, so I'm totally digging this. I can't tell if the buttons are plastic and modified to look like wood or they are.. to me, it reminds me of some coconut shell earrings I have. They have the same markings on the underside as my earrings. Who knows, just buy the dress already!
summary: true to size, good quality, very comfortable, won't regret!

Other than the sizing option, the dress is made of thick material and is super stylish and cute. I have no other concerns or complaints. A video will be uploaded soon. I hope it helps you. This is a review of the large size dress.

These are my wifes comments on the dress.  She normally wears a medium in dresses (she is 54, a 4/6, depending on the dress, 130 pounds and 36C) but in this case based on the sizing on the description page, she got the large.  Sizing with this is a bit small as this large fits like what a US medium size normally would for her but this dress fits her size well.  If you are a larger than a 4/6, then this large dress will not fit as the material does not really stretch much, if at all.  The dress is comfortable in the chest area and the underarms and the sleeves which are sort of a half sleeve length fit at the bend of the elbow like the dress is supposed to do.  The dress is made of polyester and the quality is ok considering the price but the dress isn't as soft as some dress made of higher quality material.  Even with the material not as soft as she would like, she feels the dress is fairly comfortable to wear.  Although I personally don't like the way the dress looks, the wife likes the colorful pattern which gives it a unique look.  The seams of the dress are sewn well with no issues.  The dress conforms to the body well and gives a slimming look.  It is a nice casual fall dress and goes well with boots but check the product description for sizing as this runs small.

4 stars

I ordered the white version of the dress in a small for a sorority event. I had hesitations after reading reviews online about the quality of ROMWE's clothing. When it came in, I was expecting the worst, but the dress itself wasn't actually that bad. There were a few threads that were fraying, which was annoying, and there was absolutely no way the dress could be worn without a slip. All in all though, it wasn't that bad for how much it cost. I ended up returning it because I needed it for a specific event and didn't want to pay more for a slip when I could just buy a different white dress, but if you're just buying it for fun, I think it's pretty cute! I think getting it in another color might help as well. In the white version, it was obvious that the fabric was thin and pretty sheer. I think getting the black version might help avoid that problem. If you're looking for something cute and inexpensive, ROMWE is the way to go. Just don't expect anything super high quality!
summary: You get what you paid for

I bought another size as a gift for a friend but her dress was made slightly irregular because the sleeves fit tighter on the left vs the right. She loved the color so she didn't want the headache of parking and returning. I took off a star for the sleeve issue.

The color is slightly off from optic white, but certainly not ecru or ivory. This year I've dropped about 25 lbs, and am re-ordering a size 14. For me, this is a perfect summer dress. I need sleeves, and I want flowy  and breezy. I like to change the buttons to simple white ones. Makes it easier to dress up if necessary. I've literally worn this as a swimsuit cover-up during the day, and with cute earrings and sparkly flip flops for dinner that night in a gourmet restaurant. I can't imagine a figure this dress wouldn't compliment!

So pretty and flattering, I plan to buy another!

But the materials are good and the clasp works well... if you manage not to cut so much off in repeated attempts that you can USE the thing. Which I barely accomplished. (And I do a lot of small modifications, not a butter-fingers.)
summary: If you can cut to fit with the precision of a cyborg with a laser eye, great, buckle is good: if not, try a different design.

It is hard to tell if it was returned previously and resold on Amazon.  Why would someone sell a (supposedly new) item on Amazon with tags conspicuously cut off?
As for the quality, it is cheap.  It is definitely not your typical american comfy cotton tshirt type of fit.  I ordered a size 4T for my 3 year old.  It fits like a 3T. reviewText: I got this at a discounted price in exchange for my review and was really excited to get it. However, when it came I immediately thought it was a girl's shirt. It doesn't look like the picture that is posted. The seam around the neck and arms is more feminine than you'd see on a boy's shirt. The color is more of a peach color than orange and the colors around the monkey are more pink and purple. When I got it I showed my 6 year old son and said that it was for him and his response was "that's a girl's shirt!" Well kids usually don't lie  However, the material was nice and soft and it came fast and was packaged great. My son is on the smaller side for a 6 year old and it fit him perfect. I would probably order up so that it would last through the season. When I received it I emailed the seller and told them I was sending it back because I thought the order was wrong. They were very prompt in getting back to me and assured me that it was right and offered me a refund. Great customer service! So now his baby sister will get this shirt when she grows into it.

Very cute and soft shirt. The only problem was the color is more peach-like than I was expecting. For whatever reason I thought it was going to be more of an orange color. I would buy from this company again but would go with a different color. I rec'd this product at a discounted price for a fair and honest review.

Such a cuuute shirt!!! The colors are just as vivid and bright as pictured, so I am already pretty happy with that part. The fabric is a nice & sturdy cotton, waaay better than I expected for the price. The little flames from the tail of the rocket ship kind of flap out past the arm/chest, for a unique 3D look, which is my favorite part. Ugh, this shirt is so cute! I purposely bought this 1-2 sizes too large for my daughter, so she can grow into it and wear it later on. That being said, it *appears* to me to be true to size, though I can't be 100% sure since it obviously doesn't fit her yet. I'll probably pair this tee on my daughter with a cute orange tutu or silver sparkly leggings and some navy blue shoes... can't wait! I always appreciate her clothes in the more "standard" colors, like with this shirt... I don't like anything too "out there," where I might have trouble mix & matching it with a bottom, so this shirt's bold, bright, simple design is perfect. (Please note that I received this item at a discount in exchange for my honest & unbiased review. I am in no way affiliated with the seller or with Amazon. I hope my review is helpful to you!)

I don't think my daughter will do such a thing but I wanted to point that out.

Thank goodness for that because who wants droopy shirt that falls off the shoulders. The stitch work itself has a white backing for protection. It does feel a little itchy but I'm sure I could add my own cotton to the back. (Or in my experience most shirt with this backing usually come off within a year or so)also please excuse my floor it's in remodeling so it's just the cement slab haha

The overlay is suppose to be longer but it is considerably longer all the way around by several inches which makes walking a challenge. My seamstress adjusted this problem. The dress is beautiful and everyone loves it including me! I didn't mind paying a seamstress since the dress was so inexpensive. Each dress is handmade so each size 10 may fit a little different? So plan on ordering a size smaller or having alterations done.

The birds are cuts and the tree and petals are exactly what I hoped for. The size, however, is where Im stuck. Its a little larger than I expected so I requested a different size for a replacement- great customer service by the way! Based on the coat alone- I really really like it. The print is dope and the colors are beautiful. I plan to wear this through fall and bust it back out in spring. The color combo lends itself to pretty much any season and its pretty thin so itll work as a windbreaker or with some layers. Its a great bomber coat without the heavy feel. I only took off a star because the sizing was off and I really wanted to wear it to church and couldnt. The sleeves were long and the torso was a little longer than most bomber styles would be. Im a short gal but I tried to follow the sizing information and it wasn't as accurate as I thought. Otherwise this would be 5 stars. Ill update when I receive my corrected size coat. Hoping it fits perfectly!
summary: Super awesome print, great color combo but sizing was a little off

reviewText: My cousin is 54 and about 130lbs. A small fits perfectly on her. Im 411 and around 110lbs and its too long for me / baggy. But luckily it wasn't for me. The jacket goes well with plain (white/black colors) and its comfortable. My cousin wore it out and said she received a lot of compliments and was able to wear it with multiple outfits. I recommend the product for taller individuals.
Design is nice. The color is like in the picture. Fabric  is thin and light. It is also long.

I am a big sweater/jacket person. It makes me feel more comfortable but sometimes you just really need a cute light jacket that doesn't make you sweat. This jacket is perfect for that!

Things I love:
The fabric design-modern, more unique and super pretty.
How light weight it is - I love jackets that aren't too hot.
The coloring. I love the colors chosen including the ribbing on the neck and arms.

Things I wish were different:
Pockets! I think everything should have pockets.
The zipper is a little rough at times.

I'm 5'3" and the jacket hits me a little lower than a normal jacket would. At first I didn't like it but then I liked it more. It was just a matter of getting used to it.

I paired it with all black and got a ton of comments on it.
I have worn it with athletic clothes for a more sporty look or a dress for a more formal look. It definitely makes you stand out in a good and interesting way.
Even my husband commented on it. We were at an event and he said he looked over and was like wow, looks good. You know it is a win when your husband takes notice. lol.

Now I'm envying and thinking of buying this again in a different color!

Update: I have gotten several compliments about this jacket from strangers and friends. It seems to catch the eye well.

Looks stylish and you could use it as a layer while indoors.  Look carefully there are no pockets in the jacket.  That's my only pet peeve, as I got misunderstood with the images.  Nothing with the product though.

Its a simple jacket, true to color and size, good autumn or spring wear.

Such a beautiful jacket! Very good quality, fits absolutely perfect and looks amazing. You can wear it with shorts, dresses, or any kinds of jeans - it will look great with anything. Im obsessed with it!

There is one large middle one that has two open pockets and one zipper pocket inside, two good sized zipper pockets on the outside of the purse (one on the front and one on the back), a small open pocket on the side, a larger open pocket on the front that I almost missed seeing because it blends in very well, and of course the zipper on the side for my 9mm that has a little case with velcro to attach to the side and not move around (it comes with two keys for the lock on the zipper).

reviewText: Took this on a one-week trip abroad, and it performed well. I am kind of a small person (5'2, 130 lbs) and tend to be a minimalist when I pack - I am always looking for ways to lighten my load. I always struggle with finding luggage that doesn't overwhelm or stress me because it's so big and hard to lift on my own into overhead compartments. With this 18-inch suitcase, I didn't have any issues getting through airport security and it always fit easily in overhead compartment. My only gripe is that the front pocket is a tight squeeze - would not be able to fit anything more than a slim magazine or notepad in there. Either way, I am really happy with this luggage and plan to take it on more trips abroad!

This product is superior to any other similar carry-on that we looked at. It came packaged extremely well. It has regular rollers which we like (we don't like the spinner rollers as they take up too much room in the overhead bin of an airplane), so, this product fit our needs. It's also the smaller size we were looking for because the airlines keep reducing their size regulations for carry-on luggage. Plenty of pockets, quality zippers, nicely designed, and overall it is a high quality item.

reviewText:
I ordered the blue1 t-shirt for my son in a size 3T.  After a full month, my package finally came.  However, it was not the style that I had ordered AND it was in the wrong size  I received a 4T.  I have emailed the seller, but after a week, I still have not heard from them.  My experience with this seller has been subpar, by far.

I did purchase this shirt at a discount in exchange for my review.  So here is the review of what I received (despite it not being what I ordered).

The product that I received was a light blue t-shirt with a London double decker bus on it.  The brand is Little Maven.  It is made in China and shipped from China.  It came in a size 4T which looks about the right size for a 4T, but cant be too sure because my two year old is just now starting to wear 3T and I do not have much in the size of 4T in which to compare.

The dashed yellow line and the words BUS STOP are embroidered on the shirt.  The double decker bus with the windows and tires and sign are additional pieces of fabric sewn on top of the shirt.  It does look nice.

A nice bonus feature is that the neckline/collar of the shirt can be expanded by undoing two snaps along the shoulder.  I can value this because my son always fights me when a shirt collar is a little snug getting it over his head.

The care tag says its 100% cotton exclusive of the decoration of the shirt.
-Wash before wear
-Machine wash warm with like colors
-Use only non-chlorine bleach when needed
-Tumble dry medium
-Warm iron if needed

** I received this product at a discount in exchange for my fair and honest opinion.  The above review is based off of my own personal experiences and is 100% my own.

The chest area is too big, (which is fixable by adjusting the halter tie) and it provides great support. It's baggy around my stomach, but fits snug across my hips. If you have bigger hips, plan for a larger size, because that upper thigh squish is the most uncomfortable thing about bathing suits, and with this one, the back is the only part that doesn't stretch, so it's best to be on the safe side.

reviewText:
This dress is perfect for summer. I love yellow, and love the style of this dress.  It boasts a high neck, and is sleeveless.  If you don't care for the sleeveless style, you can easily add a shrug on top for a sophisticated look (which I plan to do in spring and fall weather).

 I ordered a size small, which indicated is would fit a size 4 or 6.  Luckily, it is true to size, which I found with all the clothing made by this company.  On me, this dress hits mid thigh, so I usually wear tights or leggings with it.  I think the length of the dress will be different for everyone depending on how tall they are.  The color of the fabric reminds me of a mustard color, which is really cute on clothing.  Add a cute necklace, shrug, leggings, sandals, or boots, and you have a really cute and stylish outfit.

 I always check new clothing to see if it has been made and finished well.  I didn't find any loose threads, or problems with the stitching.  For the price, this dress is a good deal.  It washes well, and is a great, versatile piece.  I did receive this product at a promotional price for an honest evaluation.  I haven't found any problems with the fabric, design, or workmanship.  Overall, it's really cute, and I love the color.  It's comfortable to wear, and I get a lot of compliments when I wear it.
summary: Very cute.  Easy to pair with leggings for a cute outfit!

reviewText:
So far I would say that this bracelet is an unbeatable value.  Not only do the looks compliment my watch, the price was amazing.  The polished detail on the middle links adds a dimension that really looks great and belies the price point.  The bracelet fit my average size wrist (a ROUGH measurement indicated a wrist circumference of about 7 7/8") fine without adjustment.

The only concern I have is a slight worry about the clasp.  It's still working well a couple months in, but has come undone a time or two on its own.  I don't usually wear metal bands/bracelets on my watches, so my experience with this style clasp is limited, and this may be typical of the type.

I would recommend this item almost completely unreservedly to anyone who is looking for an inexpensive but great-looking bracelet for their watch.

reviewText:
The fabric itself is thin, thin enough to be transparent when held up to the light and certainly transparent once stretched over the body.  When I held up the dress out of the original packaging, I could tell by the cut that it was not going to be as long as on the model.  The tag (which I would think would have been in the back or on the side seam) was right at the neck (assuming you wear the dress as depicted, as a scoop back dress).  As a curvy girl, the fabric was unflattering, though I think it may have been alright with a fair bit of shapewear.  The cut itself was nice enough, shaped appropriately for an hourglass figure.  It seemed as though it would likely be light enough to leave me unencumbered on a warm day.

Overall, I'm disappointed, but I think it could have been O.K. for somebody, just not me.
summary: Thin, Too Short, Comfortable, Though Unusable

reviewText: This suit is absolutely super cute and I want to love it but the sizing is way off for most people.  Based on the published size chart we went with a Large even though in most normal suits sold in the US in size ranges a small is the perfect size.  The top is listed to fit a  31.5 to 35.4 bust, and the waist a 26.7-30.7.  With a normal bra size of 36C I thought the top might be a bit snug but its much to large and fits rather loose.  With a 27.5" waist I thought the bottoms would be loose, but they are too snug.  I think with the bottoms the problem might be that they don't actually make it to the waist, they sit low on the hips so if you have any hips or butt they will be to small. I am not sure how I could tactfully say that if you are under 20 and blessed (or augmented) up top but not on the bottom and say a size 2 that the Large I received would be the perfect fit.  The only reason I can see for the top is they do say in the product listing to allow for nearly 2 inches of size variation.  Do they realize that the difference between a small and a large is less than that? I think my set is plus 1" in the top and minus 2" in the bottom. If they weren't labeled I would suspect that it was just a one size suit but they clearly have labels with the sizes on them. If they are all cut the same I would suspect that the perfect fit would be a small top without the pads and an extra large bottom.  Its a complete shame because the suit is extremely cute and I love the clasp back and sexy look of the webbing on the top while still providing good coverage and it prevents any chance of spill over if you are active in your suits. Because of the design the top can still work but I will have to find a matching white bottom which sucks because I love the string side detail. The materials and construction seem to be really quite good, its just the sizing that seems to be way off.  if it were't for how good looking the top is I would probably give it a lower rating.  I received this item at a discount in exchange for my honest and unbiased review.
summary: Love the look, top just a bit big, bottom much smaller than expected

reviewText: This bathing suite has a very exotic look and I was sure it would be a perfect fit for me. It looked perfect for hanging out by the pool but even better, vacationing on the beach.  So I just had to get it.  To be honest, I got the bathing suite a size too small, which is totally my fault because it does say that the sizes may run smaller. However, I gave the suit to my friend who is about 2 sizes smaller than I am and it fit her perfectly.  She did have a bit of a pouch in her lower abdomen, which totally did not show that much when wearing the bathing suite.  It really slims your core and hides the folds and pouches in your mid section. Another thing about the bathing suit I love is the fact that you can wear it with or without the straps. Either way it works. My friend is a D cup size for bras so the top part of the bathing suite did not hold completely without the strap. So she felt more comfortable wearing it with the strap but I am definitely getting a bigger size fore myself. I cant wait. I would definitely recommend this bathing suite to anyone looking for style, fashion and a perfect fit.  This product was bought at a discounted price in return for my honest review.

reviewText:
I have a great boyfriend who really likes lingerie. So I've been purchasing a bunch & comparing how things feel & fit. I picked up this ELACUCOS Women's Sexy Lingerie Lace See-through Babydoll Nightwear Dress because it was a new pattern. I REALLY like the pinstripes, so I thought I'd give it a go.

It arrived quickly & upon opening it, I was impressed by the fabric & design. The chemise is well made, the stitching is complete & it looks great. Overall, it is lightweight, comfortable & flattering. The lace fits fairly well. I've noticed a lot of times, the lace will look crappy or be way too loose. That's not the case here, it's smooth & well cut. I would sleep in this one even if my boyfriend wasn't home because it just feels good against my skin! As for the G-string, it has the same material as the chemise. The style is the same as most of these outfits. There is a loop from the middle string that connects around the waistband. I gotta say that I don't really like that style as it tends to twist when I try to put them on or off. Regardless, I love the chemise with the pinstripes & the fabric, so I can wear just that to bed if I wanted.

The set fit me well & was very flattering. This will get some use!

I did receive this ELACUCOS Women's Sexy Lingerie Lace See-through Babydoll Nightwear Dress at a discounted rate in exchange for an honest opinion & unbiased review.

This latter does get in the way of their usefulness if you are accustomed to holding something with one hand while slipping your glasses on with your other -- these do take 2 hands to put on. It seem to hold the charge off and on most of the day.  I just got them so I'll keep testing them out.  In general it's a good looking shoe without the lights on!  We purchased the silver shoes.  The lights are interchangeable as far as color goes.  You press the button and they turn green.  Press it again and it turns yellow.  Press it again and it turns red.  You get the picture.  There's even a flashing color mode.  Really neat for kids!  Love the fact that there's no laces as well!

I even tried to tie the neckline tighter, in an effort to make the netting hang less, but that did little more than make the suit extra uncomfortable. It's a super cute concept, but poorly designed. AND, I am super bummed. Back to the drawing board--to find the perfect suit for Summer!!

First of all, I am unable to wear it since the bottom part of the sleeves do not fit past my wrists. I am 5 ft. tall, and have  tiny wrists/arms, otherwise I doubt it would even fit up my wrists. The fit everywhere else is perfect though, so if I went up a size or two so it could fit up my arms, it would be way too big everywhere else. Also, you can't see it in the picture at all, but this is very thin and sheer (the white is anyway). It actually has a satin lining on the inside that gives it a strong lingerie-like feeling. The quality is not the best, there are loose seams everywhere, and you can tell it was not put together well. The back is super cute and I love the style, but the sizing and quality are definitely not on point. Also, it did not come with any tags. I know that it is hand-wash, but I would still expect some kind of tag-it did not even come with a sales tag on it. Overall I am not impressed with this dress.

reviewText:
I wish this dress had been tweaked just a little bit so that I could rave about it.  The idea is there, the execution isn't though.

First off, the fabric.  It looks and feels like something you would expect out of a cheap Halloween costume or cheap lingerie.  I got black since I assumed it would have the least chance of being see-through.  Didn't work.  It's like the designer put together two layers of see-through, stiff chiffon and said okay that will work.  Not quite, sorry bud.  There are also loose seams EVERYWHERE and the straps look and feel incredibly flimsy.  Like one tug and it's done for.

Secondly, the fit.  I love loose dresses.  I love off-the-shoulder tops.  Combine the two and I was super excited.  Unfortunately, the sleeves are made so small I don't think my six-year-old niece could wear them.  If I'd gone up in size they might have fit, but then it would look like I'm wearing a tent.

I'm going to take a stab and say that I could probably sew something better than this.  Unless some serious design changes are made, I wouldn't recommend spending your money on this dress.  Unless you're looking for a nightie with really tight sleeves.

***Please note that I received this product at a discounted rate in exchange for my honest and unbiased review. With this said please know I do not give everyone a 5 star rating and that in no way giving me the product at a discount or for free changes how I feel about the product. I review all products as if I had purchased them for what they sell for on Amazon. My reviews are here to give an accurate depiction of the product. The opinions stated in this review are 100% honest and I am not being paid to review this product***

There are several different types of mesh which provide padding on the bottom, stay tight on arches, open air on top as not to take up room in your shoe. You will stay cool. I also use these socks when mountain biking and they grip just as good in a MTB shoe as a running shoe.
If you are new to expensive socks, just give these are hard try for 2 months and then throw on one of your old pairs - you might not ever return to low priced socks again.

These goggles are fine, not fabulous. I chose them because they looked a little different from your run of the mill cartoony kid goggles. My five year old son really enjoys them. And that is the primary reason they get the four stars. However, there are some cons. For one, the blue cast seen through the lenses does not do any favors as far as clarity goes. I would have preferred a lighter cast of polarized lens. The blue is a bit dark and my son had some trouble seeing clearly when first trying them on indoors. The part I disliked the most was the extra strap on the sides after adjusting to fit my son's head. These are supposed to be kid goggles but there just seemed to be so much excess strap that they stuck out in a somewhat dorky fashion on either side of my son's head. I know this is a problem for many kinds of goggles but I don't think the straps needed to be that long. What I really wish is that there were some way to secure them down so they wouldn't flop about but I think you only get that option with high end goggles. It doesn't pose a problem. It just doesn't look as cool that way.

For the price, the look and the solid quality so far, I am glad I got these goggles. They come with a good case and instructions for care as well so I am happy about the general packaging. They seem to put care into their product. So, four stars it is.

This product was provided at a discounted price in exchange for my honest review. I strive to provide fellow shoppers with a thorough, sincere and informative review to help them make their final purchasing decision. If I do not like a product, I will be brutally honest about it because I abhor inflated reviews. Both sellers and buyers benefit much more from quality feedback. And I myself rely heavily on purchaser reviews when I shop and compare products so I hope you find mine helpful as you shop around.
summary: Decent kid goggles with a few issues

reviewText:
I purchased the Komene Swim Goggles For Children for my daughter. She has been asking me to get her new goggles repeatedly. I purchased goggles from the local stores. She always had the complaint that they fogged over, leaked, didn't fit right, were hard to adjust, etc. It seemed like we were constantly adjusting the side adjustment bands when she was at swim lessons or the pool. My daughter has worn the  Komene Swim Goggles For Children twice so far and she loves them.  I adjusted the head strap once when they first arrived and haven't had to touch them since. I am so excited about that. Seemed like I was adjusting the other goggles at least 2-3 times each time she wore them. She never had to lift them to empty the water from leaking. Her eyes stayed protected and dry the whole time.  No fogging was noted either which is nice. At first glance I thought the size may be too large for her little face, but after adjusting she reported that the Komene Swim Goggles For Children fit just fine. The best part is that I won't have to keep throwing money at different goggles and she has finally stopped asking about goggles every other day. She is excited about the Komene Swim Goggles For Children and I am extremely pleased with them.
Disclosure: I received this product for a discount or free in return for my honest review..and I honestly and very impressed with them.

These goggles are pretty cool. They easily adjust and have quick release in the back, so no more hair pulling!  They have reflective coating on the lenses to reduce glare. The eye pieces make a great seal. The goggles come in a protective carrying case and with decent care instructions. This style of goggle is definitely for a swimmer who takes care of their equipment.

These are the best children's goggles I have ever bought.  I have a 6 year old grandson who is in the pool every waking minute at my house if I don't limit him.  He has had a lot of cheap goggles in the past and would not wear them because they are so hard to put on and they won't stay in place.  They are also hard for him to put on because the always pull his hair.  When I gave him these goggles he was able to put them on after I helped him adjust the straps and now he wears them every time he goes in the pool.  I am probably going to have to buy him another pair to take home with him.  His eyes were always red from the chlorine in the pool but now they are clear as can be.  I love these goggles.  I was given these goggles at a discount for my honest opinion.
My daughter loves these. It's very comfortable. It comes in a hard case too, so you don't see scratch it up. I received this product at a discounted price in exchange for an honest review

reviewText: She loves 'em.

The goggles are pretty good - they are small enough for my youngest child.

I have 3 kids who all love to swim, but hate getting water in their eyes. They spend a great deal of the summer at summer camps either as a camper or a missionary volunteer. They get lots of swim time in.

Most years, I've bought them the most basic cheapest goggles I can find. Generally, it's not very long before the straps won't tighten and basically fall our, rendering the goggles useless, or they get lost.

Once in awhile I've found a little better pair on clearance and the kids much prefer to use them, but they to break by summer's end.

This summer, we've decided to get the kids decent goggles for camp.

This is one of the pair and my 6 1/2 year old son.

I've bought quite a few goggles this spring for the kids and have given this child a couple pair.  Most of the ones that say they are for men, woman and youth are a little big still for this son.  They work but smaller would be better.

This pair, is a  child's pair and fits him well.  He will be taking his goggles to camp next week so will get lots of use, but he did get a chance to try these our once.  He said they felt good and kept water our.

The straps were not hard to adjust.  I do prefer the styles with 2 straps around the back, but even without that these seem to stay in place pretty well.

I think he will like having these this summer at camp

I purchased the black version hoping to have a versatile casual dress that I can wear with a blouse underneath or with leggings. I discovered that it has several problems wearing it all by itself or with layering:
1) the material feels and looks like a man-made material that it is (polyester) which equals: cheap!!!
2) the material shows anything underneath (lines, bulges, etc.)
3) the fit under the hips is very wide - you can see it even on the pictures with the model. It just does not fit or hug your curves where it should
4) it wrinkles and it has to be ironed which is kind of silly with polyester, and not at all handy when you travel
5) the dress is too long to be worn with leggings

Having said all this, I didn't return it since the price I paid was so low. I hope to have it trimmed a bit and will have to opt for very thin blouse if I want to go for a layered look. Yeah, I am almost talking myself out of keeping it.

Photos do not do this dress justice. I am in love with this beautiful A line dress. This is one of those dresses that just makes you look good and feel good when you wear it. I ordered this dress in red. The color is rich and vibrant. Style: The style of this dress is a classic A line sheath dress with a gentle scooping neckline. It has princess seams on the front and back, so it is fitted in the bust and waist. The seam lines from the front curve just below the hip to meet the seams at the back. That is a nice design detail. The short sleeves are a nice length. They fall just above the elbow. Skirt length is just above the knee. One of my favorite details of this dress is the long exposed metal zipper. Not only is it functional, it creates interest to the back of the dress. You always hear people say that you need to have a little black dress in your closet. This is definitely the red equivalent. This is certainly a wardrobe staple. This is such a stylish dress. It has a lot of design details that make it perfect for just about every occasion. This dress is perfect for work, school, social events, weddings and/or church. Because the style is flattering but simple you can accessorize this dress in a million ways. You can add a colorful scarf to the neck or shoulder. You can add a belt at the midriff or waist. It also looks beautiful with a blazer for a dressy business look. Fabric and garment care: The fabric of the dress is made of cotton/nylon blend. It has a softness to it that only real cotton has. There is a nice weight to the fabric. No need for a slip under this dress, you can not see through it anywhere. This dress can be machine washed in cold water on delicate cycle. However, I think I may hand wash with woolite to preserve the color and shape of the dress. Dry in the same manor as a sweater, laying flat on a towel. Fit: This fit of this dress is exactly what I expected. I typically wear a 6 and it fit perfectly. This dress hugs the curves in all the right places. It makes your body look great but not like you are trying too hard. I am obsessed with this dress. I have only had it two weeks and I have already worn it three times. This is an important piece in my wardrobe. I will wear it for years to come. ANGVNS Womens Half Sleeve Seamed A-Line Dress Wear to Work Causal Party Dress Red M Sample provided for testing and reviewing.
summary: Beautiful dress that makes me feel good when I wear it

I was an instant fan of Patricia Nash when I first saw her merchandise in a local department store about a year and a half ago.  I particularly like her products because unlike most designers today her products are genuine leather and animal material.  I know a lot of people are against it, but if I am going to pay for it I want it to last and leather lasts.  She also is probably one of the most reasonably priced designers today.  I first saw this bag online and loved it from the moment I saw it.  I don't know why but it screams ranch at me and I love the rustic but also modern feeling of it.  When I recieved it, actually today, I fell in love with it all over again.  I love that it truely is a unique piece since mine has more foil on the front of the bag, which I assume it is hand applied or sprayed on so not every piece is going to look exactly like the photo.  I also love how soft it is, but I noticed after touching the front a few tiny flecks of the foil, I understand over time it may lose a little of it and give the piece even more character, but I will be extra careful with and make sure not to allow it to get wet. I also love that the strap can be removed because it is attached by snaps under the front flap.  Another positive it comes with a nice bag to store it in when I'm not using it and I can register it.

Now I have to say why this didn't get 5 stars.  I first have to say if you are a person that likes a large purse, this is not the purse for you.  I love small purses because I hate carring a lot of stuff and a sm purse helps with that, but this is a small purse.  Now it may stretch a little since it is leather but it was a snug fit with my keys compact lighter and I had to change to a sm wallet with a coin purse on it and a seperat card holder for all my cards. This purse definately needs a small thin wallet.  It has a zipper pocket in the middle which could house money and change but I prefer a seperate wallet.  The only other thing about the bag I'm not thrilled with is that even though the strap can be removed, I can't make the strap a smaller size.  With a bag this small I like to have the option of making the strap into a wristlet size.  I tried wrapping the strap around a few times under the flap, but I noticed that it pulled on the front snap and I didn't want to stretch it.  And finially I would have bought it from Amazon but I didn't because I found it on sale for a rediculously low price and I ended up ordering 2 other Patricia Nash bags.

Overall I will enjoy this purse for many years to come!

reviewText:
I ordered this sweater actually because I already had one in one size up from Macy's so I knew it would fit (I have lost weight).  I also like that it came fast and shipping was not expensive or I think was free.  However, it was raining and the sweater was folded up small and put in a plastic mailer so when opening I had to be careful not to get it wet.  It arrived nice and new and clean though.  I also ordered a Karen Scott sweater, just a little different style but basically the same sweater, from Macy's and it came folded like you would fold a sweater before placing in a dresser drawer, and it came  in a clear plastic bag within the plastic mailer which was nice as it was also raining that day when I received it and no drips got on the sweater. reviewText:
These Cottonique brand Scrunchies are almost perfect (note the word almost).

I'm allergic to many types of plastic, elastic, and fabric, so I purchase only 100% cotton items. I settled on these Scrunchies since they came in a pack of all black and they looked like regular Scrunchies. I started using them in June of 2016, and now own 15 Scrunchies (three packs).

My first impression of these Scrunchies was very good. They did not have a factory odor, chemical smell, plastic smell, or rubber smell. They were a true "dark black" color and did not look faded or worn out. They were also 100% cotton, one of my primary reasons for ordering them.

The first annoyance I had with these Scrunchies was the tags on each Scrunchy. The tags are big, white, and sewn into the Scrunchy in a way that if you cut the tag out you can screw up the seam on the Scrunchy and it will fall apart and be useless. This occurred with two Scrunchies before I learned to just get used to the tags and try to tuck them in. Still, I don't think individual tags are necessary and they are cleverly not shown on the Amazon photographs.

I use these Scrunchies in my thick, shoulder length hair which is almost always in a ponytail unless I'm sleeping. I shower with a Scrunchy in place, remove it to wash my hair, and put it right back in before I put my hair towel on. Wet Scrunchies have to be hung on  a doorknob or placed on a flat surface to dry overnight or they will smell like mildew in the morning.

When these Scrunchies get wet they shed. When I say shed, I don't mean a small little fuzzy piece here or there, I mean black fuzzy pieces everywhere...in my hair, on the floor of the shower, on my t-shirts, and on the towels. If you wash them prior to the first use, they shed less the first time you get them wet, but they still do shed on a regular basis, even after dozens of washings.

Like all Scrunchies, these start to lose their shape over time. 6 of the Scrunchies I own are so bent out of shape that they no longer stay tight in my hair. Photos show them hanging on a door knob so you can see the difference in length when they get bent out of shape as well as them side by side on the counter. The far left Scrunchy is the newest, the middle Scrunchy is one year old, and the end Scrunchy is one completely bent out of shape.

I've tried many brands of Scrunchies that are 100% cotton, including some that are handmade, and yet the only ones I've stuck with are the Cottonique brand Scrunchies because they look and feel like normal Scrunchies and hold your hair tightly in place.
summary: Great Scrunchies for people with allergies to plastic, rubber, or inorganic materials. I wish they didn't have individual tags!

reviewText: I ordered this hat in red. The color was just as I imagined. My hat arrived on a sunny day and I was happy to put it on right away.  It is super lightweight and has an adjustable strap if you need to tighten it. I have a pretty small head and it fit me perfect. No adjustment needed.  It was very easy to roll up into my purse once night fell. I realized that as any article of clothing I should have washed it beforehand. I threw it in a cold wash and it came out as red as it went it. Overall this hat is perfect for keeping the sun out of your eyes and it won't add to your sweatometer.  I have purchased this item at a discount for an honest review.

This is a really well made hat.  Its super soft and has a good shape to it.  It folds up really small for travel as advertised.

The only problem?  Its not for an adult.  I don't have an overly large head, but it just did not even go down on my head and stuck up.  That being said, it was the perfect size for my daughter and she was thrilled when I gave it to her.  She plans to spend a lot of time in California this summer with relatives and it will be a good sun hat for her that can be packed up and taken anywhere.

I would recommend this product, but for a child or teen, not an adult.  I think because the product is made in China, the models used for the patterns are a little smaller on average than most American.  It probably would work good for a petite adult women too.  If that is you, get this hat.  If its not, I would keep looking.

I received this product at a discount or for free in exchange for an honest review.  The price I paid did not influence my review.

Great hat. It fits perfectly and you can adjust its width by using the string in the middle. Good quality sewing job, great fabric. Would definitely recommend. I received this hat at a discount in exchange for my honest and unbiased review.

Great Hat.  Nice material, size is spot on and the Navy is perfect..  Shipping took longer than expected, but it was a great value so well worth it.  May purchase another as  a gift.

This is a cute hat. I wanted something with a big enough brim to keep the sun out of my face when I'm out in the sun but not so big a brim It overwhelms my head. This hat does just that. Plus it sits well on my head so that the wind kicks up it doesn't blow off.
The hat is well made. The seams are straight and even, no buckling anywhere. It looks really nice and fits well. There's also a tie around the rim that allows you to adjust the fit if necessary. I didn't have to do that.
This hat comes from China and I was told to expect it in the second week of July or later. It arrived in June so I was very happy about that. I bought this hat in grey but I might order another one in black. It's a nice little hat.

I have been trying out hats to use for sun protection.  I haven't been a hat person in the past, but I had a basal cell carcenoma removed from near my eye and it had given me a whole new appreciation for hats that will block the sun.  I like the price and free shipping of this hat.  It took awhile to arrive, but then again...good price and free shipping.  I ordered the grey.  In a change from the expected, this hat actually looks better in person than in the pictures on the sale page.  The material in the picture looks a little cheap, but the actual material feels and looks very nice.  It came folded neatly and the fact that it lays flat would make it easy to pack.  It fits better than most hats on my head (22.5 in circumferance using my tape measure).  The only problem is that came with a strong chemical smell.  I have had it sitting out all day and the smell isn't as bad but still strong enough that I wouldn't be able to wear it.  If the smell airs out then it will be a great little casual hat for days I will be spending some time outdoors.  I will still use a wider brimmed hat with true SPF for days at the beach though.
I purchased this product at a discounted price in exchange for an honest review.
summary: I like the price and free shipping of this hat

reviewText: The Elacucos hat seems well made and durable. It has has an adjustable strap to get a better fit. The only thing is after letting out all of the slack it is still a little tight. I did receive this product at a discounted rate in exchange for a fair and unbiased review.

I wear glasses and despite them being transitional lenses the suns ray's hit my eyes from above my glasses causing glare issues.  I have a myriad of sun hats from caps to wide brimmed beach hats.  However the bigger the brim the more the hat acts like a sail in the wind and blows away.  I had taken to caps because they can be adjusted to be tight on the head but they only offer protection for the eyes.

This cute little fishing hat is a nice compromise. My eyes are shaded adequately and protection from the sun is available for my ears. There is also some protection for my face.
The best thing is the adjustable band with a toggle which keeps the hat in place even when it's windy.  The hat is reversible and has a couple of small air vents. The fabric is lightweight and the hat can be folded up to fit in a bag or pocket.  I bought this hat in both black and cream and expect to get much wear from both.  I received a discount for this item in return for an honest review.
summary: Shades from Glare and Prorects Ears

reviewText: I say fit as expected with hesitation, because usually women's hats do not fit.  I have very thick hair.  Ahem.  Anyway, this fits fine, but then again, it's unisex.  I do not know how it would fit any man over average height, so bear that in mind.  It is my new fishing hat!  I have been wearing a baseball cap a friend gave me a few years ago, but I wanted something more stylish.  It's cool because you can can fold it up and shove it in a bag or pocket.  THere is a drawstring around the outside that allows you to adjust the size and fit if it's too big.  If it is too small, you're out of luck.  Anyway, I'll be taking this to Canada for the summer for wearing out in the boat fishing.  Hopefully it will become my new lucky hat!  (Meaning NO PIKE).  I think it is cute and stylish, and my sweetheart smiled when I modeled it for him.  Who could ask for more than that? reviewText:
I bought this hat as it seemed like a good hat for wearing while working outside, hiking, fishing, etc. That said, I did so feeling a little bit skeptical because there were several mixed reviews on the hat; The negative reviews stated that the hat ran a little bit small...

The hat is made of a nice material and seems pretty rugged. The hat has a "drawstring" which will allow it to be tightened in the event that it is too large for the wearer - although unless a child is planning on wearing the hat, I cannot see any reason for this feature (again as the hat runs small).

The side portion of the hat has some nice metal ventilation holes in it which allows your head to breathe so you do not overheat while wearing the hat.

To speak further on the size of the hat, I would not say that i have a big head, but I am not sure what average head size is.
When i measured my head, the circumference of my head is 23.5 inches - this hat is somewhat small on me, but is still wearable. because of the material - i am concerned that it will shrink if it is washed in anything but cold water.

I have to add that I received this item at a discount or for free in exchange for my honest and unbiased opinion in the form of a product review. The review is to serve the purpose of letting potential buyers know what to expect (the good, the bad, and the ugly) prior to purchasing an item from Amazon. It is kind of a "buyer beware program, and I am glad to be part of it!
summary: Nice hat if it fit my "big" (23.5 inch circumference) head, otherwise well constructed.

reviewText:
I am in love with this bracelet! I am a bigger gal, so my wrists are bigger than the normal size, so bracelets are hard to find. I ordered this anyways, because I love the cross design, and hoped for the best. At first glance, I didn't think this would work, because it didn't fit me, and I didn't see where it was adjustable, so I was going to give up. However, I kept investigating it, and saw 2 little gaps, and figured out that it was adjustable! You just have to pull the strings to loosen it up, and once on, pull the opposite way to tighten it back up again! I will be wearing this a lot! The only negative to this bracelet, is the 2 long strings that hang down from it while wearing it, it's a bit annoying, but I will figure out a way to tuck in the strings so its better.

I received this product at a discount in exchange for my honest review!!

I bought this bracelet for my teenage daughter who LOVES jewelry, she wanted another accessory for her vast collection. The seller offered a variety of color choices, however we stuck with a classy clear, and gold-tone. When the bracelet arrived, it was exactly as pictured, the bronze goldish color was a great contrast to the sparkle of the gems. The charm at the center of the bracelet is an Egyptian Ankh which symbolizes the breath of life. The size of the charm was 1.5" x 1.0" with adjustable drawstrings that can be used to either tighten or loosen the bracelet to fit many wrist sizes. Though how to loosen and tighten the bracelet was a bit difficult for me, my fashion forward daughter found it quite simple and easy. The bracelet fit my daughter well and the stones have yet to fall off. Overall, this product is a fashionable Egyptian Ankh bracelet that my daughter loves to wear as an accessory to many of her outfits. I received this product at a discount in exchange for my honest and unbiased opinion.

reviewText: Though it may be too late for more ppl to buy for this year's prom, I would like to say that this dress was absolutely mind-blowing. Buying online is a gamble-HTYS, however, doesn't seem to play with customers. They did not disappoint. The dress quality was perfect: beading, bosom ruffles, the lace-up. The fabric material was good as well, the black satin-like interior and the chiffon(?) exterior. The problems that I had was that it was too long. BUT better too long than too short. Also, the strap was too long BUT that was easily fixable. (just find a tailor) The gradient was magnificent-->black is a slimming color and red, a voluptuous one. Mine was custom-made, and so it fit nearly perfect. To make sure that the dress suits your body, do email/message them and provide them with those measurements (if unsure, round up). Customer service is great: fast replies (shout out to Jane). FYI, custom-made comes at no extra cost, so if you don't know your size according to the size chart, that's the best option. The shipping was fast: came earlier than the anticipated arrival date.

I am giving this five stars even though the dress shoulder strap was a little bit big. We did the custom option and we probably messed up the measurement somewhere. The custom option was a great feature for us. My daughter is a curvy girl with a very large bust that makes buying a formal very difficult, with this option it allowed the dress to be made to her curves and hide the parts of her she is not happy with.
This was purchased for my daughter's prom and she was very pleased with the dress. She received numerous compliments and was one of a kind.
The representative answered all the questions very quickly when we sent them out. They asked us for an expected delivery date, we had 3 weeks until prom, I asked for the 18th and it actually made it here the week before that. Even with expedited shipping the dress was cheaper than any store here.

I bought this dress for my oldest daughter to wear in my upcoming wedding. One thing I need to mention, the color says "hunter green", but it looks to be aqua (my main color is Tiffany blue) in the above picture. However, upon arrival, we compared this color to the other gowns I had purchased and this is actually more of a mint green. I felt I needed to mention that so if you are looking for an aqua colored gown, this is not aqua but more mint. While I was hoping it was more aqua, I will not be returning it because it is beautiful and it was a custom-made piece. I will just deal with the color difference. That's the least of my worries at this point for my wedding. Lol

The gown itself is very well made and beautiful. My daughter loves it and it fits her beautifully. After purchasing it, I received an email from the maker asking for my daughter's measurements, which I promptly sent. While the gown fits her very well, the bust is a bit big, even though I sent her exact measurements. I may have to get it taken in a bit, but that's okay.

The communication was excellent and they were quick to answer all my emails in a timely manner. I bought this gown on a Saturday afternoon and we were given an estimated delivery date of the first week of June. However, the dress arrived less than 2 weeks AFTER ordering it. Talk about fast! And this was for a customized gown!

This purchase was definitely a bargain considering how fast it came and how beautiful it is. The dress is not a lightweight dress, but it's not heavy like a bridal gown either. It does have a bit of a train, meaning it's longer in the back. It's a very pretty, flowing gown and my daughter is one very happy gal.

I purchased the Mudder Antique Style Black Quartz pocket Watch to carry in my pocket. Because of the work I do I can not wear a regular watch because I am always getting it hung up on things. This allows me to simply put the watch in my pocket without worrying about getting hurt while I am working. I Really Love the Design of this pocket watch, it reminds me of my granddads old pocket watch he carried with him everywhere he went. It has Quartz movements that keeps perfect time. The dial of the watch is white with roman numerals, the case is made out of a black alloy that also has roman numerals around the outside of the case. It comes complete with a carrying chain which makes is Very Easy to remove from your pocket and also keeps you from losing your watch if it would happen to fall out of your pocket. I was Really impressed with the Quality of their pocket watch and am Amazed at the Very Affordable price. If you like pocket watches and the look of yesterday this is a Excellent Choice for a Affordable pocket watch that keeps Perfect time. I would Very Highly Recommend the Mudder Antique Style Black Quartz pocket Watch to everyone that wants a High Quality Pocket Watch with the Antique Look. These nose rings are EXTREMELY small,  so small that they will not work for me. They looked a lot bigger..  I would not recommend this product unless you want to use them as a fake piercing as that is all they are good for.

If I could rate something negative stars, that's what I would rate this product. These are quite possibly the worst hoops I've ever put in my nose. I've had my nose pierced for 2 years&have never had a problem with it. I put the black hoop in on Wednesday, and it was difficult to put in (it took me 15 minutes) and wasn't very pointed to go through the hole. When I finally got it in, it was sore from all the effort. The next day, my nose was so red and swollen I couldn't even flare my nostrils. I took the hoop out immediately, which was difficult from how swollen up my nose is! I put in an L-shaped stud, and again my nose is so swollen I could barely get it through the hole! Now today (Friday) my nose is still so sore, red and swollen I can barely wash my face. I'll NEVER buy jewelry from anywhere other than Body Candy ever again!

Update:

I strongly recommend you avoid purchasing this product or any other product made by this manufacturer.
